        • Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Lourdes from territories taken from the Township of Somerset-Sud and the Township of Stanfold.[540]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Clophas from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Flix-de-Valois.[541]
      • 11 October: Creation of the Township of Bois.[542]
      • 13 October: Creation of the Village of Ville-Marie from territories taken from the Municipality of Tmiscaming.[543]
      • 15 October: Creation of the Township of Guigues from territories taken from the Municipality of Tmiscaming.[544]
      • 25 October: Creation of the Village of North Hatley from territories taken from the Township of Hatley.[545]
      • 11 November: Creation of the Township of Knogami.[546]
      • 17 November: Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Rose-de-Watford from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Justine.[547]

      1898[edit]

      • 1 January: Creation of the United Townships of Robertson-et-Pope.[548]
      • 3 January: Creation of the Township of Kiamika.[549]
      • 15 January:
        • Creation of the Village of Grand-Mre from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Flore.[550]
        • The Village of Saint-Lambert became a Town.[551]
        • Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Bon-Conseil.[552]
      • 14 February: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Thuribe from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Casimir.[553]
      • 21 February: Creation of the Village of Saint-Raymond from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Raymond-Nonnat.[554]
      • 24 February: Creation of the Village of Saint-Benot from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Benot.[555]
      • 21 March: Creation of the Village of Saint-Joseph-de-Bordeaux from territories taken from the Parish of La Visitation-du-Sault-au-Rcollet.[556]
      • 30 March: Creation of the Village of Beaurivage-de-la-Longue-Pointe from territories taken from the Parish of Longue-Pointe.[557]
      • 22 April: Creation of the Village of Bernierville from territories taken from the Township of Halifax-Sud.[558]
      • 29 April: Creation of the Village of Saint-Jrme from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jrme.[559]
      • 2 June: Creation of the Township of Saint-Paul-de-Mille-Vaches from territories taken from the Municipality of Escoumains.[560]
      • 23 September: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Jean-de-Dieu from territories taken from the Parish of Longue-Pointe.
      • 26 September: Creation of the Village of Saint-Joseph from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Hyacinthe-le-Confesseur.[561]
      • 7 October: Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Lourdes-de-Ham from territories taken from the Township of Ham-Nord.[562]
      • 9 November: Creation of the Township of Ashford.[563]
      • 18 November: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Paul-de-l'le-aux-Noix from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Valentin.[564]

      1899[edit]

      • 1 January: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Jean-des-Piles from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jacques-des-Piles.[565]
      • 21 January: Creation of the Village of Asbestos from territories taken from the Township of Shipton.[566]
      • 2 February: Creation of the Parish of La Visitation-de-la-Bienheureuse-Vierge-Marie from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Antoine-de-la-Baie-du-Febvre, the Parish of Saint-Zphirin-de-Courval and the Parish of Sainte-Monique.[567]
      • 10 March:
        • The Municipality of Tmiscaming became the Township of Duhamel.[568]
        • The Village of Windsor-Mills became a Town.[569]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-lie-dOrford from territories taken from the Township of Orford.[570]
      • 28 March: Creation of the Municipality of Ascot Corner from territories taken from the Township of Ascot, the Township of Eaton, the Township of Stoke and the Township of Westbury.[571]
      • 24 April: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Rmi.[572]
      • 22 July: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Lonard-de-Port-Maurice from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Raymond-Nonnat.[573]
      • 3 October: Creation of the Township of Albanel from territories taken from the United Townships of Normandin-et-dAlbanel.[574]
      • 10 October: Creation of the Village of Tadoussac from territories taken from the Municipality of Tadoussac.[575]
      • 28 December: Creation of the Village of La Providence from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Hyacinthe.[576]

      20th century[edit]

      1900[edit]

      • 8 January: Creation of the Township of Campbell.
      • 13 January: Creation of the United Townships of Woburn-et-Louise from territories taken from the Municipality of Linire.[577]
      • 9 March: Creation of the Parish of LEnfant-Jsus from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-la-Beauce and the Parish of Sainte-Marie-de-la-Nouvelle-Beauce.[578]
      • 10 April: Creation of the Village of Gentilly from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Edouard-de-Gentilly.[579]
      • 11 April: The Municipality of Linire is split into the Township of Marlow and the United Townships of Risborough-et-Marlow.[580]
      • 27 July: Creation of the Village of Inverness from territories taken from the Municipality of Inverness.[581]
      • 31 October: Creation of the Parish of Cur-Trs-Pur-de-la-Bienheureuse-Vierge-Marie-de-Plaisance from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Anglique.[582]

      1901[edit]

      • 16 January: Creation of the United Townships of Wurtele-Moreau-et-Gravel.[583]
      • 21 January: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Louis-de-Pintendre from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-la-Victoire, the Parish of Pointe-Lvi and the Parish of Saint-Henri.[584]
      • 18 March: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Jacques-de-Parisville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jean-Deschaillons.[585]
      • 22 March: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Germaine-de-lAnse-aux-Gascons from territories taken from the Municipality of Partie-Est-du-Township-de-Port-Daniel.[586]
      • 28 March:
        • Creation of the Municiaplity of Sainte-Catherine-de-Hatley from territories taken from the Township of Hatley.[587]
        • The Village of Grand-Mre became a Town.[588]
      • 18 April: Creation of the Village of Shawinigan-Falls from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Flore and the Township of Shawenegan.[589]
      • 13 July:
        • The Parish of Saint-Jean-Deschaillons is annexed by the Village of Deschaillons.[590]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Majorique-de-Grantham from territories taken from the Township of Grantham.[591]
      • 23 July: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Andr.[592]
      • 2 October: Creation of the Village of Villers from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Edouard-de-Gentilly.[593]
      • 13 November: Creation of the Village of Daveluyville from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Anne-du-Sault.[594]

      1902[edit]

      • 11 January: Creation of the Township of Maddington from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Anne-du-Sault.[595]
      • 19 March: Creation of the Village of Saint-Guillaume from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Guillaume.[596]
      • 26 March:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Anticosti.[597]
        • The Municipality of Saint-Malo is split into the Municipality of Petite-Rivire and the Village of Saint-Malo.[598]
        • The Village of Shawinigan-Falls became a Town.[599]
      • 18 April: Creation of the Village of Montmorency from territories taken from the Municipality of Beauport.[600]
      • 30 April: Creation of the Village of Contrecoeur from territories taken from the Municipality of Contrecoeur.[601]
      • 9 May: Creation of the Municipality of Musselyville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Bonaventure-de-Hamilton and the Township of New Richmond.[602]
      • 28 May: Creation of the Village of Labelle from territories taken from the Township of Joly.[603]
      • 10 June: Creation of the Village of Saint-Chrysostome from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jean-Chrysostome.[604]
      • 12 September: Creation of the United Townships of Sainte-Anne-de-Portneuf from territories taken from the Township of Saint-Paul-de-Mille-Vaches.[605]
      • 3 October: Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-la-Paix from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Bonsecours and the Parish of Saint-Andr-Avellin.[606]
      • 13 October: The Parish of Cte-Saint-Paul became the Village of Boulevard-Saint-Paul.[607]
      • 20 October: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Ambroise from territories taken from the Township of Bourget.[608]
      • 22 October: Creation of the Village of Brompton-Falls from territories taken from the Township of Brompton.[609]
      • 5 December: The Township of Broughton became the Parish of Sacr-Cur-de-Jsus.[610]
      • 19 December: Creation of the Village of Laurierville from territories taken from the Township of Somerset-Nord.[611]

      1903[edit]

      • 15 January: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Amde from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Michel-de-Mistassini.[612]
      • 22 January: Creation of the Village of Chnville from territories taken from the United Townships of Hartwell-et-Preston.[613]
      • 18 February: Creation of the Village of Hbertville-Station from territories taken from the Municipality of Hbertville.[614]
      • 25 March: Creation of the Village of Massueville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Aim.[615]
      • 25 April:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Hermngilde from territories taken from the Township of Barford and the Township of Hereford.[616]
        • The Village of Arthabaskaville became the Town of Arthabaska.[617]
        • The Village of Brompton-Falls became the Town of Bromptonville.[618]
        • Creation of the Village of Cte-Saint-Luc from territories taken from the Village of Notre-Dame-de-Grce-Ouest.[619]
        • The Village of Roberval became a Town.[620]
      • 9 May: Creation of the Township of Pohngamook.
      • 29 May: Creation of the Village of Andrville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Andr.[621]
      • 29 June: Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Perptuel-Secours-de-Charny from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jean-Chrysostome.[622]
      • 1 July: The Village of Dorval became a Town.
      • 12 August:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Edmond from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Benot-Joseph-Labre.[623]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Henri-de-Taillon.[624]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Lon-le-Grand.[623]
      • 22 October: Creation of the Village of Chesterville from territories taken from the Township of Chester-Ouest.[625]
      • 4 November: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Firmin from territories taken from the Municipality of Tadoussac.[626]
      • 26 November:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Hubert-de-Spaulding from territories taken from the United Townships of Spaulding and Ditchfield.[627]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Denis from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Denis.[628]
      • 9 December: Creation of the Village of Beloeil from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Mathieu de Beloeil.[629]

      1904[edit]

      • 4 January: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Louis from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Maurice.[630]
      • 15 January: Creation of the Village of Saint-Pie from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Pie.[631]
      • 1 February: Creation of the Township of Turgeon.
      • 5 February: Creation of the United Townships Laverlochre-et-Baby from territories taken from the Township of Duhamel and other unorganized territories.[632]
      • 19 February: Creation of the Township of Lussier.[633]
      • 23 February: Creation of the Village of Campbells Bay from territories taken from the Township of Litchfield.[634]
      • 1 March: The Township of Tessier became the Parish of Saint-Luc.[635]
      • 15 March: Creation of the Township of Maniwaki.
      • 6 April: Creation of the Parish of Courcelles from territories taken from the Municipality of Lambton, the Municipality of Saint-variste-de-Forsyth and the Township of Aylmer.[636]
      • 13 April: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Timothe from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jacques-des-Piles, the Parish of Saint-Narcisse and the Parish of Saint-Tite.[637]
      • 20 April: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Charles-de-Mandeville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Didace.[638]
      • 25 April: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Genevive-de-Pierrefonds from territories taken from the Village of Sainte-Genevive.[639]
      • 6 May: Creation of the Village of Pontgrav from territories taken from the Municipality of Chnier.[640]
      • 31 May: The Town of Salaberry-de-Valleyfield became a City.[641]
      • 2 June: Creation of the Town of Beauceville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Franois.[642]
      • 15 June: Creation of the Village of Saint-Ambroise from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Ambroise.[643]
      • 5 July: Creation of the Township of Arago from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Cyrille-de-Lessard.[644]
      • 13 July: Creation of the Township of Letellier.[645]
      • 17 August:
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Dominique-de-Jonquire from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Dominique-de-Jonquires.[646]
        • Creation of the Parish of Trs-Prcieux-Sang-de-Notre-Seigneur from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Clestin, the Parish of Bcancour and the Parish of Saint-Grgoire-le-Grand.[647]
      • 10 September: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Elzar-de-Laval from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Vincent-de-Paul, the Parish of Saint-Martin and the Parish of Sainte-Rose-de-Lima.[648]
      • 15 September: Creation of the Village of Nominingue from territories taken from the Township of Loranger.[649]
      • 15 November: Creation of the Township of Fabre.[650]
      • 19 November: Creation of the Village of D'Israli from territories taken from the Municipality of D'Israli.[651]

      1905[edit]

      • 1 January: Creation of the Municipality of Gayhurst from territories taken from the Township of Gayhurst.[652]
      • 17 February: Creation of the Village of Gracefield from territories taken from the Township of Wright.[653]
      • 20 March: Creation of the Municipality of Partie-Est-du-Canton-de-Stukely-Nord from territories taken from the Township of North Stukely.[654]
      • 20 April: Creation of the Village of Lawrenceville from territories taken from the Township of North Stukely.[655]
      • 22 April: Creation of the Village of Saint-Jean-Baptiste-de-la-Pointe-aux-Trembles from territories taken from the Parish of Pointe-aux-Trembles.[656]
      • 20 May:
        • The Village of Kingsville became the Town of Thetford Mines.
        • The Village of Marieville became a Town.[657]
        • The Village of Petite-Cte changed its name to Rosemont.[658]
      • 11 July: Creation of the Village of Saint-Flicien from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Flicien.[659]
      • 6 September: Creation of the Village of Saint-Cyrille from territories taken from the United Townships of Wendover-et-Simpson.[660]
      • 11 September: The Village of Villeray is annexed by the City of Montral.[661]
      • 23 September:
        • Creation of the Parish of L'Ascension.[662]
        • Creation of the Township of Tach from territories taken from the Township of Bourget.[663]
      • 30 October: The City of Saint-Henri is annexed by the City of Montral.[664]
      • 2 November: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Roch-de-Mkinac from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jacques-des-Piles, the Parish of Saint-Jean-des-Piles and other unorganized territories.[665]
      • 4 November: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Laurent-de-Matapdia from territoires taken from the Township of Matapdia.[666]
      • 25 November: Creation of the Village of Lac-au-Saumon from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Edmond.[667]
      • 4 December: The City of Sainte-Cungonde-de-Montral is annexed by the City of Montral.[668]

      1906[edit]

      • 9 January: Creation of the Village of Montral-Sud from territories taken from the Parish of Longueuil.[669]
      • 16 January: Creation of the Municipality of Portland from territories taken from the Township of Portland.[670]
      • 23 January: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Grard-Magella from territories taken from the Parish of L'Assomption.[671]
      • 9 March:
        • The Village of Notre-Dame-de-Grces-Ouest became the Town of Notre-Dame-de-Grces.[672]
        • The Village of Saint-Joseph-de-Bordeaux changed its name to Bordeaux.[673]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Nazaire-de-Dorchester from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Lon-de-Standon and the Parish of Saint-Malachie-de-Frampton.[674]
      • 15 March: Creation of the Village of Cartier-Ville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Laurent.[675]
      • 16 March: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Flicien-Partie-Nord-Ouest from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Flicien.
      • 11 May: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Anne-de-Beaupr from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Anne-Cte-Beaupr.[676]
      • 13 June: The Parish of Sainte-Anne-Cte-Beaupr is annexed by the Village of Sainte-Anne-de-Beaupr.[677]
      • 30 June: Creation of the Municipality of Partie-Sud-Est-du-Canton-de-Restigouche from territories taken from the Township of Ristigouche.[678]
      • 2 October: Creation of the Village of Saint-Mose from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Mose.[679]
      • 10 October: Creation of the Township of Dorion.
      • 13 November: Creation of the Village of Laurier from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Paul-lErmite.[680]
      • 19 November: Creation of the Village of Lac-Noir from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Dsir-du-Lac-Noir.[681]
      • 28 November: Creation of the Village of Saint-Benot-Joseph-Labre from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Benot-Joseph-Labre.[682]

      1907[edit]

      • 18 February: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Grard-Majella from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-David, the Parish of Saint-Franois-du-Lac, the Parish of Saint-Michel-dYamaska and the Parish of Saint-Pie-de-Guire.[683]
      • 6 March: Creation of the Township of Montcalm from territories taken from the Township of Harrington.[684]
      • 14 March:
        • Creation of the Town of Mgantic by the merger of the Village of Agns and the Village of Mgantic.[685]
        • The Village of Bordeaux became a Town.[686]
        • The Village of Verdun became a Town.[687]
        • The Parish of Longue-Pointe is split into the Town of Longue-Pointe and the Village of Ttreaultville-de-Montral.[688]
      • 21 March: The Village of Notre-Dame-des-Neiges-Ouest became the Town of Cte-des-Neiges.[689]
      • 26 March: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Fabien-de-Panet from territories taken from the Township of Montminy and the Township of Talon.[690]
      • 19 April: The Village of Laurier changed its name to Charlemagne.
      • 26 April: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Lon-de-Marston.[691]
      • 1 May: Creation of the Village of Saint-Joseph from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Joseph.[692]
      • 20 July: Creation of the Municipality of Est-du-Canton-Armagh from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Cajetan-dArmagh.[693]
      • 2 August: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Mathias-de-Cabano from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Lac, the Parish of Saint-Louis-du-Ha! Ha! and other unorganized territories.[694]
      • 27 August: Creation of the Village of Baie-de-Shawenegan from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Flore and the Township of Shawenegan.[695]
      • 30 August: Creation of the Village of Baieville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Antoine-de-la-Baie-du-Febvre.[696]
      • 16 September: Creation of the Township of Natashquan.[697]
      • 10 October: Creation of the Municipality of Nouvelle-et-Shoolbred from territories taken from the Municipality of Shoolbred.[698]
      • 5 November: Creation of the Village of Coteau-du-Lac from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Ignace-du-Coteau-du-Lac.[699]
      • 11 November Creation of the Parish of Saint-Lucien from territories taken from the Municipality of Kingsey and the United Townships of Wendover-et-Simpson.[700]
      • 12 December: Creation of the Village of Est-de-Saint-Georges-de-Beauce from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Georges.[701]

      1908[edit]

      • 1 January: The Village of Pontgrav is annexed by the Municipality of Chnier.[702]
      • 2 April: The Municipality of Saint-Lon-le-Grand became a Parish. [703]
      • 14 April:
        • The Town of Acton changed its name to Acton Vale.[704]
        • The Village of Saint-Malo is annexed by Quebec City.[705]
      • 25 April:
        • The Town of Notre-Dame-des-Neiges is annexed by the City of Montral.[706]
        • The Town of Westmount became a City.[707]
        • The Municipality of Limoilou became a Town.[708]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Octave-de-Mtis-Sud from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Octave-de-Mtis.[709]
        • The Village of Boulevard-Saint-Paul became the Town of Ville-mard.[710]
        • The Village of Lac-Noir became the Town of Black Lake.[711]
        • The Village of Saint-Pierre-aux-Liens became the Town of Ville-Saint-Pierre.[712]
        • The Parish of Quebec became the Town of Montcalm.[713]
      • 20 May: Creation of the Village of Saint-Alexis-de-la-Grande-Baie from territories taken from the Municipality of Grande-Baie.[714]
      • 26 August: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Sabine from territories taken from the United Townships of Roux-Bellechasse-et-Daaquam.[715]
      • 31 August: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Bernard from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Ours and the Parish of Saint-Denis.[716]
      • 11 September: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Ccile from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Pierre-les-Becquets.[717]
      • 19 September: Creation of the Municipality of Pribonka from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Amde.
      • 8 October: Creation of the Village of Annonciation from territories taken from the Township of Marchand.[718]
      • 17 October: The Parish of Saint-Dsir-du-Lac-Noir became the Municipality of Saint-Joseph-de-Coleraine.[719]
      • 27 October: Creation of the Village of Sacr-Cur-de-Jsus from territories taken from the Parish of Sacr-Cur-de-Jsus.[720]
      • 20 November: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-Blandford from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Sophie-de-Lvrard.[721]
      • 2 December: Creation of the Municipality of Templeton-Nord from territories taken from the Municipality of Templeton-Est and the Municipality of Templeton-Ouest.[722]

      1909[edit]

      • 4 January: Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Sacr-Cur-dIssoudun from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Antoine-de-Tilly, the Parish of Saint-Apollinaire, the Parish of Saint-douard-de-Lotbinire, the Parish of Saint-Flavien and the Parish of Sainte-Croix.[723]
      • 23 January: Creation of the Village of Bcancourt from territories taken from the Parish of Bcancour.[724]
      • 27 January: Creation of the Village of Shawbridge from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Jrme, the Parish of Saint-Sauveur and the Township of Abercrombie.[725]
      • 1 February: Creation of the Township of Lytton.[726]
      • 4 February: Creation of the Village of Ayer's Cliff from territories taken from the Township of Hatley.[727]
      • 11 February: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Hlne-de-Breakeyville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jean-Chrysostome.[728]
      • 27 February: Creation of the Township of Ndlec.[729]
      • 1 March: The United Townships of Woburn-et-Louise became the Parish of Saint-Augustin-de-Woburn.[730]
      • 9 March: Creation of the Village of Saint-Hugues from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Hugues.[731]
      • 10 March: Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Edwidge from territories taken from the Municipality of Roberval.[732]
      • 3 April: Creation of the Municipality of Metgermette-Nord from territories taken from the Township of Metgermette-Nord.[733]
      • 27 April: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Thcle from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Thcle.[734]
      • 7 May:
        • The Town of Lachine became a City.
        • The Village of Laprairie-de-la-Magdeleine became the Town of La Prairie.[735]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Grard-Magella from territories taken from the Parish of Ancienne-Lorette and the Parish of Saint-Ambroise.[736]
      • 29 May: The Village of Lorimier is annexed by the City of Montral.[737]
      • 26 July: Creation of the Village of Laval from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Angle-de-Laval.[738]
      • 27 July: Creation of the Village of Robertsonville from territories taken from the Municipality of Nord-du-Canton-de-Thetford.[739]
      • 30 August: The Municipality of Sainte-Edwidge became the Parish of Sainte-Hedwige.[740]
      • 9 September: Creation of the Village of La Tuque.[741]
      • 30 September: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Jacques-le-Majeur-de-Wolfestown from territories taken from the Township of Leeds and the Township of Wolfestown.[742]
      • 14 October: Creation of the Village of Mont-Laurier from territories taken from the Township of Campbell.[743]
      • 22 October: Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-des-Laurentides from territories taken from the Parish of Charlesbourg.[744]
      • 14 December: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Apolline-de-Patton from territories taken from the Municipality of Cap-Saint-Ignace.[745]
      • 30 December: The Town of Limoilou is annexed by Quebec City.
      • 31 December: The Town of Saint-Louis is annexed by the City of Montral.[746]

      1910[edit]

      • 1 January: The Municipality of Nord-du-Canton-de-Thetford is split into the Parish of Saint-Antoine-de-Pontbriand and a section of the Parish of Sacr-Cur-de-Marie.[747]
        • Creation of the Parish of Sacr-Cur-de-Marie from territories taken from the Municipality of Sud-du-Canton-de-Thetford and the former Municipality of Nord-du-Canton-de-Thetford.
      • 2 February: Creation of the Village of Tuque Falls.[748]
      • 15 March: Creation of the Village of Saint-Bruno from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Bruno.[749]
      • 11 April: Creation of the Village of Sault-au-Rcollet from territories taken from the Parish of La Visitation-du-Sault-au-Rcollet.[750]
      • 4 June:
        • The Town of Bordeaux, the Town of Cte-des-Neiges, the Town of Longue-Pointe, the Town of Notre-Dame-de-Grce, the Town of Saint-Paul, the Town of Ville-mard, the Village of Ahuntsic, the Village of Beaurivage-de-la-Longue-Pointe, the Village of Rosemont and the Village of Ttreaultville-de-Montral are annexed by the City of Montral.[751]
        • The Town of Fraserville became a City.[752]
        • Creation of the Town of Montral-Est from territories taken from the Parish of Pointe-aux-Trembles.[753]
        • Creation of the Town of Saint-Tite from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Tite.[754]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Isidore-d'Auckland from territories taken from the Township of Auckland.[755]
        • Creation of the Parish of Brbeuf from territories taken from the Township of Amherst and the United Townships of DeSalaberry-et-Grandison.[756]
      • 30 June: Creation of the Town of Beaconsfield from territories taken from the Municipality of Pointe-Claire.[757]
      • 4 August: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Gabriel-Archange.[758]
      • 3 November: The Village of Lauzon became a Town.[759]

      1911[edit]

      • 4 January: Creation of the Village of Saint-Simon from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Simon.[760]
      • 5 January: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Eusbe.[761]
      • 31 January: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Antoine-de-Padoue-de-Kempt from territories taken from the Village of Saint-Mose, the Parish of Saint-Octave-de-Mtis and the Parish of Sainte-Angle-de-Mrici.[762]
      • 20 February: Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Lourdes-de-Lorrainville from territories taken from the Township of Duhamel and the United Townships of Laverlochre-et-Baby.[763]
      • 14 March:
        • The Village of Montral-Sud became a Town.[764]
        • The Village of Saint-Joachim-de-la-Pointe-Claire became the Town of Pointe-Claire.[765]
      • 24 March:
        • Creation of the Town of Greenfield-Park from territories taken from the Parish of Longueuil.[766]
        • Creation of the Town of La Tuque by the merger of the Village of La Tuque and the Village of Tuque Falls.[767]
        • The Municipality of Est-du-Canton-Armagh changed its name to Sainte-Euphmie-sur-Rivire-du-Sud.[768]
        • The Village of Rigaud became a Town.[769]
        • Creation of the Township of Boyer.[770]
      • 12 April: Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Florence-de-Beaurivage.[771]
      • 30 June: Creation of the Town of Baie-dUrfe from territories taken from the Town of Sainte-Anne-de-Bellevue.[772]
      • 10 August: Creation of the Village of Saint-Agapitville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Agapit-de-Beaurivage.[773]
      • 26 August: Creation of the United Townships of Casgrain-et-Leverrier from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Pamphile.[774]
      • 19 September: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Jeanne-de-Neuville from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Jeanne-de-Neuville.[775]
      • 12 October:
        • The Municipality of Shenley-Dorset-Jersey-et-Marlow became the Parish of Saint-Martin.[776]
        • The Township of Marlow became the Parish of Saint-Gdon.[776]
      • 8 November: Creation of the Township of Gurin.[777]
      • 29 November: Creation of the Village of Saint-Andr-Avellin from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Andr-Avellin.[778]
      • 12 December: Creation of the Village of Bonsecours from territories taken from the Municipality of Islet.[779]
      • 23 December: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Croix from territories taken from the Municipality of Hbertville and the Parish of Saint-Jrme.[780]

      1912[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-des-Sept-Douleurs from territories taken from the Municipality of Isle-Verte and the Municipality of Kakonna.
        • Creation of the Township of Est-du-Canton-de-Campbell from territories taken from the Township of Campbell.[781]
      • 24 January: Creation of the Village of Hatley from territories taken from the Township of Hatley.[782]
      • 7 February: Creation of the Village of Bel-Air from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Eustache.[783]
      • 14 March:
        • Creation of the Town of East Angus from territories taken from the Township of Westbury.[784]
        • The Town of Thetford Mines became a City.
        • The Parish of Saint-Dunstan-du-Lac-de-Beauport changed its name to Saint-Dunstan-du-Lac-Beauport.[785]
        • The Parish of Saints-Anges-de-Lachine became the Town of Ville-Lasalle.[786]
      • 18 March:
        • Creation of the Village of Almaville from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Mont-Carmel.[787]
        • The Village of Saint-Dominique-de-Jonquire became the Town of Jonquire.[788]
      • 30 March: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Landre from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Ulric.[789]
      • 3 April:
        • Creation of the Town of Laval-des-Rapides from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Martin.[790]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Ivry-sur-le-Lac from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Agathe and the Township of Wolfe.[791]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Pierre-de-Vronne--Pike-River from territories taken from the Municipality of Stanbridge Station, the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Stanbridge, the Parish of Saint-Georges-de-Clarenceville and the Parish of Saint-Sbastien.[792]
        • Creation of the Village of Courville from territories taken from the Municipality of Beauport.[793]
        • The Village of Saint-Jean-Baptiste-de-la-Pointe-aux-Trembles became the Town of Pointe-aux-Trembles.[794]
      • 12 June: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Nicolas-Sud from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Nicolas.[795]
      • 27 June: Creation of the Municipality of Partie-Est-du-Canton-dEly from territories taken from the Township of Ely and the Township of Ely-Nord.[796]
      • 10 July: Creation of the Village of Saint-Hilaire from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Hilaire.[797]
      • 23 July: Creation of the Village of Saint-Charles-des-Grondines from territories taken from the Municipality of Grondines.[798]
      • 27 July: Creation of the Village of Lyster from territories taken from the Municipality of Sainte-Anastasie-de-Nelson.[799]
      • 12 August: Creation of the Village of Knogami from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Dominique-de-Jonquires.[800]
      • 20 September: Creation of the Village of Linire from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Cme-de-Kennebec.[801]
      • 1 October: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Viateur from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Cuthbert.[802]
      • 3 October:
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Isidore from territories taken from the Township of Guigues and the United Townships of Laverlochre-et-Baby.[803]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Placide.[803]
        • The Township of Fabre became the Parish of Saint-douard-de-Fabre.[803]
        • The Township of Guigues became the Parish of Saint-Bruno-de-Guigues.[804]
        • The United Townships of Laverlochre-et-Baby became the Municipality of Est-des-Cantons-Unis-de-Laverlochre-et-Baby.[803]
      • 10 October: Creation of the Village of Saint-Flavien from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Flavien.[805]
      • 22 October: Creation of the Village of Saint-Casimir from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Casimir.[806]
      • 24 October:
        • The Municipality of Nouvelle-et-Shoolbred changed its name to Escuminac. [807]
        • The Municipality of Shoolbred changed its name to Saint-Jean-lEvangliste.[808]
      • 2 November: Creation of the Village of Rivire-du-Moulin from territories taken from the Municipality of Chicoutimi.[809]
      • 6 November: Creation of the Village of Saint-Michel-de-Laval from territories taken from the Parish of La Visitation-du-Sault-au-Rcollet and the Parish of Saint-Lonard-de-Port-Maurice.[810]
      • 7 November: Creation of the Village of Saint-Lonard-dAston from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Lonard.[811]
      • 12 November: Creation of the Municipality of Sud-Ouest-du-Canton-dHalifax-Sud from territories taken from the Township of Halifax-Sud.[812]
      • 15 November: Creation of the Municipality of Nord-du-Canton-de-Windsor from territories taken from the Township of Windsor.[813]
      • 20 November: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Eugne-de-Guigues.[814]
      • 10 December: Creation of the Village of Saint-Jacques-de-l'Achigan from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jacques.[815]
      • 13 December: Creation of the Village of Prade from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Anne-de-la-Prade.[816]
      • 21 December:
        • The Town of Maisonneuve became a City.[817]
        • Creation of the Town of Mont-Royal from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Laurent.[818]
        • The Town of Summerlea is annexed by the City of Lachine.[819]
        • The Town of Verdun became a City.[820]
        • The Village of Cartier-Ville became the Town of Cartierville.[821]
        • Creation of the Village of Giffard from territories taken from the Municipality of Beauport.[822]

      1913[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • The Town of Montcalm is annexed by Quebec City.
        • The Village of Bel-Air is annexed by the Municipality of Saint-Eustache.[823]
        • The Parish of Saint-Gabriel-Archange changed its name to La Durantaye.[824]
      • 25 January: Creation of the Municipality of Guigues from territories taken from the Township of Ndlec.[825]
      • 29 January: Creation of the Village of Lambton from territories taken from the Municipality of Lambton.[826]
      • 11 February: Creation of the Village of Rapide-de-lOrignal from territories taken from the United Townships of Robertson-et-Pope.[827]
      • 19 February: Creation of the Village of Beauport from territories taken from the Municipality of Beauport.[828]
      • 27 March: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Ccile from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Ccile.[829]
      • 23 April:
        • The Village of Saint-Ambroise changed its name to Loretteville.[830]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Zotique from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Zotique.[831]
        • Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Mont-Carmel from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Bernard-de-Lacolle.[832]
      • 30 May: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Marie from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Marie-de-la-Nouvelle-Beauce.[833]
      • 31 May: Creation of the Municipality of Nouveau-Salaberry from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Ccile.[834]
      • 1 June: Creation of the Town of Chteauguay from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Joachim-de-Chteauguay.[835]
      • 27 June: The United Townships of Bowman-et-Villeneuve are split into the Township of Bowman and the Township of Villeneuve.
      • 8 July: Creation of the Village of Saint-Henri from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Henri.[836]
      • 24 July: Creation of the Municipality of Partie-Sud-du-Canton-de-Masham from territories taken from the Township of Masham.
      • 7 August: The Village of Baie-Saint-Paul became a Town.[837]
      • 29 September: Creation of the Village of Saint-Casimir-Est from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Casimir.[838]
      • 6 December: The Municipality of Guigues changed its name to Notre-Dame-des-Quinze-du-Canton-Guigues.[839]
      • 16 December: Creation of the Township of Saint-Godefroi from territories taken from the Township of Hope.[840]
      • 22 December: Creation of the Village of Verchres from territories taken from the Municipality of Verchres.[841]
      • 29 December: The Parish of Saint-Antoine-de-Padoue-de-Kempt changed its name to Saint-Antoine-de-Padoue.[842]
      • 31 December: Creation of the Village of Fortierville from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Philomne-de-Fortierville.[843]

      1914[edit]

      • 19 January: Creation of the Village of Saint-Dominique from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Dominique.[844]
      • 31 January: Creation of the Village of Amos.[845]
      • 19 February:
        • Creation of the Town of Hampstead from territories taken from the Village of Cte-Saint-Luc.[846]
        • Creation of the Town of Roxboro from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Genevive.[847]
        • The Town of Windsor Mills changed its name to Windsor.[848]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Lac-des-Seize-les from territories taken from the Township of Montcalm and the Township of Wentworth.[849]
        • The Village of Beloeil became a Town.[850]
        • Creation of the Village of Saraguay from territories taken from the Town of Cartierville and the Parish of Saint-Laurent.[851]
        • The Village of Sault-au-Rcollet became a Town.[852]
      • 11 March: Creation of the Village of Notre-Dame-de-Portneuf from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Portneuf.[853]
      • 29 March: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Honor from territories taken from the Township of Tremblay.[854]
      • 3 April: Creation of the United Townships of Masson-et-Laviolette.[855]
      • 4 April: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Agathe from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Agathe.[856]
      • 14 May: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-la-Rivire-Bleue.[857]
      • 1 June: Creation of the Town of Lry from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Joachim-de-Chteauguay.[858]
      • 17 June: Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Rose from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Rose-de-Lima.[859]
      • 25 June: Creation of the Village of Amiante from territories taken from the Municipality of Sud-du-Canton-de-Thetford.[860]
      • 28 July: Creation of the Village of Val-Barrette from territories taken from the Township of Est-du-Canton-de-Campbell.[861]
      • 27 August:
        • Creation of the Village of Farnham from territories taken from the Township of Farnham-Est.[862]
        • Creation of the Village of Rougemont from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Michel-de-Rougemont.[863]
      • 29 October:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Sept-Cantons-Unis-de-Saguenay.[864]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Simon from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Bonaventure-de-Hamilton.[865]
      • 5 November: Creation of the Village of Lotbinire from territories taken from the Municipality of Lotbinire.[866]
      • 7 November: Creation of the Village of Charlesbourg from territories taken from the Municipality of Charlesbourg.[867]
      • 28 December: Creation of the Township of Romieux from territories taken from the United Townships of Dalibaire-et-Romieu.[868]

      1915[edit]

      • 30 January: Creation of the Village of Saint-Charles from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Charles-Borome.[869]
      • 5 March:
        • Creation of the Town of le-Dorval from territories taken from the Town of Dorval.[870]
        • Creation of the Town of Laval-sur-le-Lac from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Dorothe and the Parish of Sainte-Rose-de-Lima.[871]
        • The Town of Outremont became a City.[872]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Honfleur from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Anselme, the Parish of Saint-Gervais-et-Saint-Protais, the Parish of Saint-Lazare and the Parish of Sainte-Claire.[873]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Lac-Tremblant-Nord from territories taken from the Township of Joly.[874]
        • The Village of Saint-Michel-de-Laval became the Town of Ville-Saint-Michel.[875]
        • The Village of Sainte-Agathe-des-Monts became a Town.[876]
        • The Parish of La Visitation-du-Sault-au-Rcollet became the Town of Montral-Nord.[877]
        • Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Liesse from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Laurent.[878]
        • The Parish of Saint-Lonard-de-Port-Maurice became a Town.[879]
      • 17 April: The Parish of Saint-Flicien-Partie-Nord-Ouest changed its name to Notre-Dame-de-la-Dor.[880]
      • 21 April: Creation of the Village of Donnacona from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jean-Baptiste-des-cureuils.[881]
      • 3 May: Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Madeleine-de-la-Rivire-Madeleine from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Maxime-du-Mont-Louis.[882]
      • 10 May: Creation of the Village of Saint-Pierre-du-Lac from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Pierre-du-Lac.[883]
      • 25 May: The Village of Rapide-de-lOrignal is annexed by the Village of Mont-Laurier.[884]
      • 14 September: Creation of the Village of Saint-Alexandre from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Alexandre.[885]
      • 22 September: Creation of the Municipality of Escourt.[886]
      • 28 September: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Raymond-de-Pennafort-de-Weedon from territories taken from the Township of Weedon.[887]
      • 5 October: Creation of the Village of Turcotte from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Thophile.[888]
      • 7 October: Creation of the Village of Val-Jalbert from territories taken from the Municipality of Roberval and the Parish of Saint-Louis-de-Mtabetchouan.[889]
      • 27 October:
        • Creation of the Village of Angers from territories taken from the Village of Masson.[890]
        • Creation of the Village of Deux-Rivires from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Stanislas-de-la-Rivire-des-Envies.[891]
      • 29 October: Creation of the Village of Howick from territories taken from the Parish of Trs-Saint-Sacrement.[892]
      • 26 November: Creation of the Village of LAbord--Plouffe from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Martin.[893]

      1916[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Marthe-du-Cap-de-la-Magdeleine from territories taken from the Parish of Cap-de-la-Magdeleine.[894]
        • The United Townships of Normandin-et-dAlbanel became the Township of Normandin.
      • 7 January: The Municipality of North-Stukely became the Parish of Sainte-Anne-de-Stukely.[895]
      • 13 January: Creation of the Village of Chandler from territories taken from the Municipality of Pabos.[896]
      • 19 January: The Parish of Saint-Louis-de-Mtabetchouan changed its name to Saint-Louis-de-Chambord.[897]
      • 7 February: Creation of the Municipality of Talon from territories taken from the United Townships of Rolette-Panet-et-Talon.[898]
      • 9 March:
        • Creation of the Town of Qubec-Ouest from territories taken from the Municipality of Petite-Rivire.[899]
        • Creation of the Town of Trois-Pistoles from territories taken from the Municipality of Trois-Pistoles.[900]
        • The Parish of Pointe-aux-Trembles became the Town of Laval-de-Montral.[901]
      • 16 March:
        • The Town of Lvis became a City.[902]
        • The Village of Dorion became a Town.[903]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Lonard-de-Port-Maurice from territories taken from the Town of Saint-Lonard-de-Port-Maurice.[904]
      • 31 March:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Henri-de-Taillon from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Henri-de-Taillon.[905]
        • Creation of the Village of Warden from territories taken from the Township of Shefford.[906]
      • 12 April: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Hilaire-de-Dorset.[907]
      • 8 May: Creation of the Village of Saint-Gdon from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Gdon.[908]
      • 3 August: Creation of the Village of Cap--l'Aigle from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-tienne-de-Murray-Bay.[909]
      • 12 August: The Village of Saint-Pierre-du-Lac changed its name to Val-Brillant.[910]
      • 26 September: The Township of Northfield became a Municipality.[911]
      • 4 October: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Claire-dAssise from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Zotique.[912]
      • 12 October: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Raphal from territories taken from the Municipality Saint-Wenceslas, the Municipality of Sainte-Eulalie and the Parish of Sainte-Anne-du-Sault.[913]
      • 22 December:
        • The Town of Cartierville and the Town of Sault-au-Rcollet are annexed by the City of Montral.[914]
        • The Town of Saint-Jean became a City.[915]
        • The Village of Courville became a Town.[916]
        • The Village of Granby became a City.[917]
        • The Village of Sainte-Thrse-de-Blainville became the Town of Sainte-Thrse.[918]

      1917[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Nord-Est-des-Cantons-de-Wabassee-Dudley-et-Bouthiller from territories taken from the United Townships of Wabassee, Dudley et Bouthillier.[919]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Louis-de-Gonzague-du-Cap-Tourmente from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Joachim.[920]
      • 1 February: The Parish of Notre-Dame-de-la-Victoire is annexed by the City of Lvis.[921]
      • 8 February: Creation of the Village of Ferme-Neuve from territories taken from the United Townships of Wurtele-Moreau-et-Gravel.[922]
      • 27 February: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Charles-de-Charlesbourg from territories taken from the Parish of Charlesbourg.[923]
      • 5 March: Creation of the Village of Wakefield from territories taken from the Township of Masham and the Township of Wakefield.[924]
      • 28 March:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saindon from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Marie-de-Sayabec.[925]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Franois-du-Lac from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Franois-du-Lac.[926]
      • 30 March: The Village of Saint-Jacques-de-l'Achigan changed its name to Saint-Jacques.[927]
      • 2 April: Creation of the Village of Petit-Lac-Magog from territories taken from the Township of Orford.[928]
      • 11 May: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Angle-de-Mrici from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Angle-de-Mrici.[929]
      • 7 June: Creation of the Village of Foster from territories taken from the Township of Brome.[930]
      • 11 June: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Venant-de-Hereford from territories taken from the Township of Hereford.[931]
      • 18 June: Creation of the Village of Saint-Jovite from territories taken from the United Townships of DeSalaberry-et-Grandison.[932]
      • 31 July: Creation of the Village of McMasterville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Mathieu-de-Beloeil.[933]
      • 1 August: Creation of the Municipality of Parties-des-Paroisses-de-Saint-Constant-et-Saint-Philippe from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Constant and the Parish of Saint-Philippe.[934]
      • 15 August: Creation of the Township of La Sarre.[935]
      • 28 August: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Angle from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Paulin and the Parish of Sainte-Ursule.[936]
      • 10 September: Creation of the United Townships of Figuery-et-Dalquier.[937]
      • 29 September: Creation of the United Townships of La Reine-et-Desmeloizes.[938]
      • 2 October:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Bishop's Crossing from territories taken from the Municipality of Dudswell.[939]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Hatley from territories taken from the Township of Hatley.[940]
      • 10 October: Creation of the Village of Champlain from territories taken from the Parish of Champlain.
      • 22 October: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Joseph-dAlma from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Joseph-dAlma.[941]
      • 14 December: Creation of the Village of Saint-Ambroise from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Ambroise.[942]

      1918[edit]

      • 4 January: Creation of the Village of Delson from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Constant.
      • 17 January: Creation of the Village of Saint-Alban from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Alban-d'Alton.[943]
      • 8 February:
        • Creation of the Village of Calumet from territories taken from the Township of Grenville.[944]
        • Creation of the Village of Como-Est from territories taken from the Village of Como.[945]
      • 9 February:
        • The City of Maisonneuve is annexed by the City of Montral.[946]
        • The Town of Joliette became a City.[947]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Charette.[948]
        • The Village of Sainte-Rose became a Town.[949]
        • The Parish of Cap-de-la-Magdeleine became the Town of Cap-de-la-Madeleine.[950]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Edmond-de-Grantham from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Bonaventure, the Parish of Saint-Germain and the Parish of Saint-Guillaume.[951]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Octave-de-Dosquet from territories taken from the Municipality of Sainte-Anastasie-de-Nelson, the Parish of Saint-Agapit-de-Beaurivage and the Parish of Saint-Flavien.[952]
      • 15 February: Creation of the United Townships of Royal-Roussillon-et-Poularies.[953]
      • 18 February: Creation of the United Townships of Fiedmont-et-Barraute.[954]
      • 22 February: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Cyprien from territories taken from the Municipality of Sainte-Rose-de-Watford and the Parish of Sainte-Justine.[955]
      • 23 February: The Village of Sainte-Jeanne-de-Neuville changed its name to Pont-Rouge.[956]
      • 6 March: Creation of the Village of Saint-Hermngilde from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Hermngilde.[957]
      • 7 March: Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Bonsecours from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Bonsecours.[958]
      • 12 March: Creation of the Village of Saint-Boniface-de-Shawinigan from territories taken from the Township of Shawenegan.[959]
      • 22 April: Creation of the Municipality of Port-Alfred from territories taken from the Municipality of Grande-Baie and the Village of Saint-Alexis-de-la-Grande-Baie.[960]
      • 27 May: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Fabien-de-Panet from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Fabien-de-Panet.[961]
      • 28 May: Creation of the Municipality of LAnnonciation from territories taken from the Parish of Annonciation.[962]
      • 1 June: Creation of the Town of Maple Grove from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Clment.[963]
      • 27 June: Creation of the Village of Luceville from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Luce.
      • 15 July: Creation of the Township of Landrienne and the Township of Trcesson.[964]
      • 29 July: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-Mont-Rolland from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Adle.[965]
      • 15 August: Creation of the Municipality of Figuery-et-Dalquier.[966]
      • 20 September: Creation of the Municipality of Authier and the Municipality of La Reine-et-Desmeloizes.[967]
      • 3 October: The Municipality of Saint-Henri-de-Taillon changed its name to Jeanne-dArc.[968]
      • 24 October:
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Marc-des-Carrires from territoires taken from the Municipality of Deschambault, the Municipality of Grondines and the Parish of Saint-Alban-d'Alton.[969]
        • Creation of the United Townships of Carpentier-et-de-Courville.[970]
      • 7 November:
        • Creation of the Village of Durham-Sud from territories taken from the Municipality of Durham-Sud.[971]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Franois-Xavier-des-Hauteurs.[972]
      • 14 November: Creation of the Municipality of Tourville from territories taken the Township of Ashford.[973]
      • 21 November: Creation of the Village of Tring-Jonction from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Frdric-de-Beauce.[974]

      1919[edit]

      • 12 February: Creation of the Village of Wottonville from territories taken from the Township of Wotton.[975]
      • 25 February: Creation of the Parish of Ascension-de-Notre-Seigneur from territories taken from the Township of Delisle and other unorganized territories.[976]
      • 4 March:
        • The City of Fraserville changed its name to Rivire-du-Loup.[977]
        • Creation of the Township of Bedford from territories taken from the Town of Bedford.[978]
      • 19 April: Creation of the Township of Privat.[979]
      • 29 April: Creation of the Village of Macamic from territories taken from the United Townships of Royal-Roussillon-et-Poularies.[980]
      • 28 May: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Jules from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Victor-de-Tring, the Parish of Saint-Franois, the Parish of Saint-Frdric-de-Beauce and the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-la-Beauce.[981]
      • 9 June: Creation of the Village of Saint-Rdempteur from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-tienne-de-Lauzon.[982]
      • 13 June:
        • Creation of the Village of Francoeur from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Apollinaire.[983]
        • Creation of the Township of Senneterre.[984]
      • 7 July: Creation of the Municipality of Est-de-la-Paroisse-de-Sainte-Flore from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Flore.[985]
      • 30 July:
        • Creation of the Village of Montauban from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-des-Anges-de-Montauban, the Parish of Saint-Rmi and the Parish of Saint-Ubalde.
        • Creation of the Village of Notre-Dame-des-Anges from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-des-Anges-de-Montauban.[986]
      • 2 August: The Village of Turcotte changed its name to Saint-Georges.[987]
      • 12 August:
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Liboire from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Liboire.[988]
        • Creation of the Township of Dumas from territories taken from the Township of Saint-Jean.[989]
      • 5 September: The Municipality of Port-Alfred became a Town.[990]
      • 23 September: Creation of the Municipality of Ndlec from territories taken from the Township of Ndlec.[991]
      • 29 September: Creation of the Village of Saint-Timothe from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Thimothe.[992]
      • 14 October: Creation of the Village of Lac-Saint-Louis from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Clment.[993]
      • 15 October: Creation of the Village of Saint-Sylvestre from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Sylvestre-de-Beaurivage.[994]
      • 5 November: The Municipality of Escourt changes its name to Saint-David-dEscourt.[995]
      • 20 November: Creation of the Village of Neuville from territories taken from the Municipality of Pointe-aux-Trembles.[996]
      • 3 December: The Municipality of Saint-Fabien-de-Panet changed its name to Saint-Juste-de-Bretenires.[997]
      • 16 December: Creation of the Village of Rawdon from territories taken from the Township of Rawdon.[998]
      • 30 December: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Madeleine from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Marie-Madeleine.[999]

      1920[edit]

      • 7 January:
        • The Village of Bagotville became a Town.[1000]
        • Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Anne-de-Beaupr from territories taken from the Village of Sainte-Anne-de-Beaupr.[1001]
      • 14 February:
        • The Town of Grand-Mre became a City.[1002]
        • Creation of the Town of Kipawa.[1003]
        • The Town of Longueuil became a City.[1004]
        • Creation of the Town of Saguenay from territories taken from the Municipality of Chicoutimi.[1005]
        • The Town of Saint-Germain-de-Rimouski changed its name to Rimouski.[1006]
        • The Village of Knogami became a Town.[1007]
        • The Village of Lennoxville became a Town.[1008]
        • Creation of the Township of Dcarie.
      • 2 March:
        • Creation of the Village of Templeton and the Municipality of Templeton-Est from territories taken from the Municipality of Templeton-Est.[1009][1010]
        • Creation of the Township of Ely-Partie-Ouest from territories taken from the Township of Ely and the Township of Ely-Nord.[1011]
      • 8 March: The Municipality of Whitton changed its name to Sainte-Ccile-de-Whitton.[1012]
      • 3 April: Creation of the Village of Saint-Jean-de-Boischatel from territories taken from the Parish of Ange-Gardien.[1013]
      • 28 April: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Znon-du-Lac-Humqui.[1014]
      • 29 April: Creation of the Municipality of Loranger from territories taken from the Township of Loranger.[1015]
      • 7 May:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Brompton-Gore from territories taken from the Township of Melbourne.[1016]
        • Creation of the Township of Isle-aux-Allumettes-Partie-Est from territories taken from the Township of le-Allumettes.[1017]
      • 25 May: Creation of the Village of Belle-Plage from territories taken from the Municipality of Vaudreuil.[1018]
      • 1 June: Creation of the Village of Bic from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Ccile-du-Bic.[1019]
      • 17 June: Creation of the Village of Saint-Ubalde from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Ubalde.[1020]
      • 8 July:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Suffolk from territories taken from the United Townships of Suffolk-et-Addington.[1021]
        • Creation of the Village of Beauport-Est from territories taken from the Municipality of Beauport and the Village of Beauport.
      • 28 August: Creation of the Village of Saint-Anselme from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Anselme.[1022]
      • 11 October: Creation of the Municipality of Montpellier from territories taken from the Township of Ripon, the United Townships of Hartwell-et-Preston, the United Townships of Mulgrave-et-Derry and other unorganized territories.[1023]
      • 15 October: Creation of the Village of Clarenceville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Georges-de-Clarenceville.[1024]
      • 26 October: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Raphal-dAlbertville.[1025]
      • 16 November:
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Alexis from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Alexis.[1026]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Joseph-de-la-Rivire-Bleue from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-la-Rivire-Bleue.[1027]
      • 17 November: The Township of Egan is split into the Municipality of Bois-Franc, the Municipality of Egan-Sud and the Municipality of Montcerf.[1028]
      • 20 November: The Village of Donnacona became a Town.[1029]
      • 11 December: Creation of the Village of Lacolle from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Mont-Carmel.[1030]

      1921[edit]

      • 31 January: Creation of the Municipality of Bouchette-Sud from territories taken from the Township of Bouchette and the Township of Wright.[1031]
      • 1 February: Creation of the Village of Saint-Cur-de-Marie from territories taken from the Township of Delisle.[1032]
      • 25 February:
        • The Town of Kipawa changed its name to Tmiscaming.[1033]
        • Creation of the Town of Lac-Sergent from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Raymond-Nonnat and the Parish of Sainte-Catherine.[1034]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Philibert-de-Beauce from territories taken from the Municipality of Aubert-Gallion, the Parish of Saint-Cme-de-Kennebec and the Township of Watford West.[1035]
        • The Township of Duhamel became the Municipality of Duhamel-Ouest.[1036]
      • 17 March: The Village of Huntingdon became a Town.[1037]
      • 18 March: Creation of the Village of piphanie from territories taken from the Parish of Lpiphanie.[1038]
      • 19 March:
        • The Town of Saint-Lambert became a City.[1039]
        • The Town of Shawinigan-Falls became a City.[1040]
        • The Municipality of Parties-des-Paroisses-de-Saint-Constant-et-Saint-Philippe became the Parish of Saint-Mathieu.[1041]
        • The Village of Petit-Mtis changed its name to Mtis-sur-Mer.[1042]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Camille-de-Lellis from territories taken from the United Townships of Roux-Bellechasse-et-Daaquam.[1043]
        • Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Sabine from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Stanbridge, the Parish of Saint-Alexandre, the Parish of Saint-Ignace-de-Stanbridge, the Parish of Sainte-Brigide-de-Monnoir and the Township of Farnham-Ouest.[1044]
      • 21 March:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Rock Forest from territories taken from the Township of Ascot and the Township of Orford.[1045]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Pierre-dEstcourt from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-David-dEscourt and the Township of Pohngamook.[1046]
      • 20 April: Creation of the Township of Langelier.
      • 29 April: Creation of the Village of Saint-Isidore from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Isidore-de-Lauzon.[1047]
      • 10 May: Creation of the Village of Saint-Jean-Baptiste-de-Blisle from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Agathe.[1048]
      • 14 May: The Village of Como changed its name to Hudson.[1049]
      • 18 May: Creation of the Township of Launay.[1050]
      • 19 May: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Clophas.[1051]
      • 30 May:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Ouest-du-Canton-de-la-Motte.[1052]
        • Creation of the Village of Sainte-Croix from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Croix.[1053]
      • 4 June:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Roch-Ouest from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Roch.[1054]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Raphal from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Raphal.[1055]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Ulric from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Ulric.[1056]
      • 13 June: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Amable from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Marc and the Parish of Saint-Mathieu-de-Beloeil.[1057]
      • 12 July: Creation of the Village of Saint-Clet from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Clet.[1058]
      • 20 July: Creation of the Municipality of Rivire-du-Gouffre from territories taken from the Parish of Baie-Saint-Paul.[1059]
      • 21 July: Creation of the Village of Deschnes from territories taken from the Municipality of Hull.[1060]
      • 22 July: Creation of the Municipality of Sydenham-Sud from territories taken from the Municipality of Baie-de-Gasp-Nord.[1061]
      • 12 August: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Luc from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Lon-de-Standon and the Parish of Sainte-Germaine-du-Lac-Etchemin.[1062]
      • 18 August: Creation of the Village of Saint-Eustache-sur-le-Lac from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Eustache.[1063]
      • 19 August:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Messine from territories taken from the Township of Bouchette.[1064]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Ludger from territories taken from the Municipality of Gayhurst.[1065]
      • 14 September: Creation of the Village of Saint-Patrice-de-Beaurivage from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Patrice-de-Beaurivage.[1066]
      • 24 September: The Municipality of Est-des-Cantons-Unis-de-Laverlochre-et-Baby changed its name to Fugerville.[1067]
      • 12 October: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Joseph-de-la-Baie-du-Febvre from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Antoine-de-la-Baie-du-Febvre.[1068]
      • 13 October:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Girardville.[1069]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Antoine-sur-Richelieu from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Antoine-de-Padoue.[1070]
      • 23 November: The Municipality of Loranger changed its name to Lacaille.[1071]
      • 21 December: Creation of the Village of Laterrire from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Laterrire.[1072]
      • 13 December: Creation of the Parish of Sacr-Cur-de-Jsus.[1073]

      1922[edit]

      • 25 January: Creation of the Municipality of Rivire-Boyer from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Henri.[1074]
      • 26 January: Creation of the Village of Kingsey Falls from territories taken from the Municipality of Chutes-de-Kingsey.[1075]
      • 27 January: Creation of the Village of Manseau from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-Blandford.[1076]
      • 30 January: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Jeanne-d'Arc.[1077]
      • 8 February: Creation of the Township of Bgin.
      • 13 February: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Narcisse-de-Rimouski from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Blandine.[1078]
      • 1 March: Creation of the Village of Saint-Victor-de-Tring from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Victor-de-Tring.[1079]
      • 8 March: The Town of Baie-Saint-Paul became a Village.[1080]
      • 21 March:
        • Creation of the Town of le-Cadieux from territories taken from the Municipality of Vaudreuil.[1081]
        • Creation of the Parish of Larouche.[1082]
      • 24 April: Creation of the Village of Saint-Paul from territories taken from the Parish of Conversion-de-Saint-Paul.[1083]
      • 30 May:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Paspbiac-Ouest from territories taken from the Municipality of Paspbiac.[1084]
        • Creation of the Village of La Reine from territories taken from the United Townships of La Reine-et-Desmeloizes.[1085]
      • 27 June: Creation of the Municipality of Val-Morin from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Adle.[1086]
      • 31 July: Creation of the Village of Saint-Wenceslas from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Wenceslas.[1087]
      • 14 August: Creation of the Municipality of Lemieux from territories taken from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-Blandford and the Parish of Sainte-Marie-de-Blandford.[1088]
      • 11 September: Creation of the Municipality of Lac-Saint-Paul from territories taken from the United Townships of Wurtele-Moreau-et-Gravel.[1089]
      • 16 September: The Municipality of Nord-du-Canton-de-Windsor changed its name to Saint-Claude.[1090]
      • 18 September: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Monique from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Monique.[1091]
      • 22 September: Creation of the Village of Saint-Faustin-Station from territories taken from the Township of Wolfe.[1092]
      • 10 October: Creation of the Municipality of Lefebvre from territories taken from the Municipality of Durham-Sud, the Municipality of L'Avenir and the Municipality of Wickham-Ouest.[1093]
      • 20 October: Creation of the Village of Wickham-Ouest from territories taken from the Municipality of Wickham-Ouest.[1094]
      • 9 November: Creation of the Municipality of Rivire-Blanche from territories taken from the Township of Ireland-Nord.[1095]
      • 16 December: The Municipality of La Reine-et-Desmeloizes changed its name to Saint-Jacques-de-Dupuy.[1096]
      • 20 December: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Adle from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Adle.[1097]
      • 29 December: The Town of Cap-de-la-Madeleine became a City.[1098]

      1923[edit]

      • 17 March: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Louis-de-Gonzague from territories taken from the Municipality of Sainte-Rose-de-Watford and the Parish of Saint-Cyprien.[1099]
      • 23 March: Creation of the Township of Senneterre.[1100]
      • 11 May: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Thomas-Didyme.[1101]
      • 23 May:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Dominique-du-Lac from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Lac and other unorganized territories.[1102]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Maurice from territories taken from the Township of Fox.[1103]
      • 7 June: The Township of Pohngamook became the Parish of Saint-leuthre.[1104]
      • 20 June:
        • Creation of the Village of Brome from territories taken from the Township of Brome.[1105]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Prime from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Prime.[1106]
      • 26 June: Creation of the Village of Ripon from territories taken from the Township of Ripon.[1107]
      • 28 July: The Municipality of Suffolk changed its name to Vinoy.[1108]
      • 22 September: Creation of the Municipality of Piedmont from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Sauveur.[1109]
      • 25 September: Creation of the Village of Shawinigan-Est from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Flore.[1110]
      • 30 October: Creation of the Township of Otis.
      • 14 November:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Eugne from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Michel-de-Mistassini.[1111]
        • Creation of the Village of Cabano from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Mathias-de-Cabano.[1112]
      • 18 December: Creation of the Municipality of Christie, the Municipality of Duchesnay and the Parish of Saint-Joachim-de-Tourelle from territories taken from the Municipality of Sainte-Anne-des-Monts.[1113]

      1924[edit]

      • 12 January: The Village of Beauport became a Town.
      • 14 January: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-Kamouraska from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Alexandre, the Parish of Saint-Andr and the Parish of Sainte-Hlne.[1114]
      • 7 February: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Jeanne-dArc from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Amde, the Municipality of Saint-Michel-de-Mistassini and other unorganized territories.[1115]
      • 8 February: The Village of Bienville is annexed by the Town of Lauzon.
      • 27 February: Creation of the Township of Denholm.
      • 15 March Creation of the Town of Isle-Maligne from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Joseph-dAlma.[1116]
      • 11 April: Creation of the Municipality of Dollard-des-Ormeaux from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Genevive.[1117]
      • 30 April: Creation of the Village of Saint-Charles-sur-Richelieu from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Charles.[1118]
      • 7 May: Creation of the Municipality of Poularies from territories taken from the United Townships of Royal-Roussillon-et-Poularies.[1119]
      • 26 July: The Village of Lac-Weedon changed its name to Saint-Grard.[1120]
      • 3 September: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Grard-des-Laurentides from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Flore.[1121]
      • 22 September: Creation of the Municipality of Villeroy.[1122]
      • 4 October: The Parish of Saint-Nazaire-de-Dorchester changed its name to Saint-Nazaire.[1123]
      • 17 November: Creation of the Village of Saint-Joseph-de-Grantham from territories taken from the Township of Grantham.[1124]
      • 18 November:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Jean-Baptiste from territories taken from the Village of Mont-Joli.[1125]
        • Creation of the United Townships of Latulipe-et-Gaboury.[1126]
      • 19 November:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Lucie-de-Beauregard from territories taken from the Municipality of Talon.[1127]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Marcellin.[1128]
      • 15 December:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Shigawake from territories taken from the Township of Saint-Godefroi.[1129]
        • The Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Perptuel-Secours-de-Charny became the Village of Charny.[1130]
      • 16 December: The Municipality of Saint-Joseph-dAlma became a Town.[1131]
      • 29 December: Creation of the Village of Enfant-Jsus from territories taken from the Parish of L'Enfant-Jsus.[1132]

      1925[edit]

      • 1 January: The Town of Laval-de-Montral is annexed by the Town of Pointe-aux-Trembles.[1133]
      • 13 February: The Village of Shawinigan-Est is annexed by the City of Shawinigan Falls.[1134]
      • 4 March: Creation of the Town of Riverbend from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Joseph-dAlma.[1135]
      • 3 April: The Village of Amos became a Town.[1136]
      • 14 May: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Augustin from territories taken from the Municipality of Pribonka and the Municipality of Saint-Amde.[1137]
      • 19 May: Creation of the Village of McNaugton from territories taken from the Village of Hudson.[1138]
      • 2 July: Creation of the Village of Saint-Paulin from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Paulin.[1139]
      • 9 September: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Hlne-de-Bagot from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Hlne.[1140]
      • 6 October:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Labrecque from territories taken from the Township of Tach and other unorganized territories.[1141]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Benot-Abb.[1142]
      • 28 October: Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Lourdes from territories taken from the Municipality of Sainte-Elizabeth.[1143]
      • 14 December: Creation of the Municipality of Rivire-au-Tonnerre.

      1926[edit]

      • 3 March:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Louis-Joliette from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Claire.[1144]
        • Creation of the Village of Priceville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Octave-de-Mtis.[1145]
      • 6 March: The Village of Hudson changed its name to Hudson Heights.[1146]
      • 11 March: Creation of the Town of Noranda.[1147]
      • 20 March: The Parish of Sainte-Marguerite-de-Blairfindie became the Municipality of Lacadie.[1148]
      • 24 March:
        • Creation of the City of Arvida from territories taken from the Municipality of Chicoutimi and the Parish of Saint-Dominique-de-Jonquires.[1149]
        • Creation of the Town of Barkmere from territories taken from the Township of Arundel and the Township of Montcalm.[1150]
        • Creation of the Town of Chteau-dEau from territories taken from the Village of Loretteville.[1151]
      • 6 April:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Pont-Viau from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Vincent-de-Paul.[1152]
        • Creation of the Village of Cap-Chat from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Norbert-du-Cap-Chatte.[1153]
      • 10 April: The Village of McNaugton changed its name to Hudson.[1154]
      • 26 April: Creation of the Village of Normandin from territories taken from the Township of Normandin.[1155]
      • 5 May: Creation of the Village of Rouyn.[1156]
      • 8 May: Creation of the Municipality of Huberdeau from territories taken from the Township of Arundel.[1157]
      • 18 May: The Village of New Rockland is annexed by the Village of Kingsbury.[1158]
      • 29 June: Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-la-Providence from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Franois and the Parish of Saint-Georges.[1159]
      • 10 July: Creation of the Village of Saint-Flix-de-Valois from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Flix-de-Valois.[1160]
      • 29 July: Creation of the Village of Saint-Sauveur-des-Monts from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Sauveur.[1161]
      • 16 August:
        • The Municipality of Saint-Amde is annexed by the Municipality of Pribonka.[1162]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Emilien from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jrme.[1163]
      • 27 August:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Colombourg from territories taken from the Township of La Sarre.[1164]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Jean-Baptiste-Vianney.[1165]
      • 3 September: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Franois-dAssise from territories taken from the Township of Matapdia.[1166]
      • 10 November: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Marc-de-Figuery from territories taken from the Municipality of Figuery-et-Dalquier and the Township of Landrienne.[1167]
      • 20 November: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Mathieu-de-Dixville from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Hermngilde and the Township of Barford.[1168]
      • 30 November: Creation of the Village of Lavaltrie from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Antoine-de-la-Valtrie.[1169]
      • 22 December: Creation of the Village of Saint-Pacme from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Pacme.[1170]

      1927[edit]

      • 1 January: The Municipality of Tadoussac became the Parish of Sacr-Coeur-de-Jsus.
      • 1 April:
        • Creation of the Town of Dolbeau from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Michel-de-Mistassini.[1171]
