        • Creation of the Town of Mercier.[1172]
        • The Village of Rouyn became a Town.[1173]
      • 30 July: The Municipality of Saint-Charles-de-Charlesbourg changed its name to Charlesbourg-Est.[1174]
      • 12 September:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Carleton-sur-Mer from territories taken from the Township of Carleton.[1175]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Roquemaure from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Jacques-de-Dupuy, the United Townships of La Reine-et-Desmeloizes and other unorganized territories.[1176]
      • 15 September: Creation of the Municipality of Grande-Valle.[1177]
      • 27 September: Creation of the Village of Henryville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Georges.[1178]
      • 30 September: Creation of the Village of Prvost from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Sauveur.[1179]
      • 12 November: The Parish of Saint-Pierre-de-la-Pointe-aux-Esquimaux became the Municipality of Havre-Saint-Pierre.[1180]

      1928[edit]

      • 11 January: Creation of the Village of Causapscal from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jacques-le-Majeur-de-Causapscal.[1181]
      • 10 March: The Municipality of Ndlec changed its name to Notre-Dame-du-Nord.[1182]
      • 13 March: Creation of the Village of Sainte-Marthe from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Marthe.[1183]
      • 22 March: Creation of the Town of Racine from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Dominique-de-Jonquires and the Township of Tremblay.[1184]
      • 16 April: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Michel-du-Squatec.[1185]
      • 28 April: Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Saint-Rosaire from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Joachim and the Parish of Sainte-Anne-de-Beaupr.[1186]
      • 8 September: The Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Saint-Rosaire became the Municipality of Beaupr.[1187]
      • 11 September: Creation of the Municipality of Mont-Saint-Michel from territories taken from the Township of Dcarie and the United Townships of Wurtele-Moreau-et-Gravel.[1188]
      • 19 October: Creation of the Municipality of Pointe-du-Lac from territories taken from the Municipality of Pointe-du-Lac.[1189]

      1929[edit]

      • 1 January: The Village of Amiante is annexed by the City of Thetford Mines.
      • 18 March: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Franois-de-Pabos from territories taken from the Municipality of Pabos.[1190]
      • 27 April: The Township of Watford West became the Municipality of Saint-Prosper.[1191]
      • 25 June: Creation of the Village of Abercorn from territories taken from the Township of Sutton.[1192]
      • 13 July: The Village of Saint-Paul changed its name to Saint-Pierre.[1193]
      • 5 August: Creation of the Municipality of Grande-Entre from territories taken from the Municipality of Grosse-le.[1194]
      • 6 August: Creation of the Village of Saint-variste-Station from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-variste-de-Forsyth.[1195]
      • 14 September: Creation of the Municipality of Taschereau from territories taken from the Township of Privat.[1196]
      • 23 September: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Jacques-de-Leeds from territories taken from the Township of Leeds.[1197]
      • 28 September: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-mile from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Ambroise.[1198]
      • 19 October:
        • Creation of the Village of Grandes-Bergeronnes from territories taken from the Township of Bergeronnes.[1199]
        • Creation of the Village of Valcourt from territories taken from the Township of Ely.[1200]
      • 9 November: Creation of the Municipality of Grande-Cascapdia from territories taken from the Township of New Richmond.[1201]

      1930[edit]

      • 18 January: The United Townships of Wurtele-Moreau-et-Gravel became the Parish of Ferme-Neuve.[1202]
      • 8 February: The Township of Kensington became the Municipality of Dlage.[1203]
      • 4 April:
        • Creation of the Town of Beauceville-Est from territories taken from the Town of Beauceville.[1204]
        • The Town of Chicoutimi became a City.[1205]
      • 14 April:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Palmarolle from territories taken from the Township of La Sarre and other unorganized territoires.[1206]
        • Creation of the Village of Lorrainville from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Lourdes-de-Lorrainville.[1207]
      • 15 April: Creation of the Municipality of Shipshaw from territories taken from the Township of Tremblay.[1208]
      • 10 May:
        • The Municipality of Est-de-la-Paroisse-de-Sainte-Flore is annexed by the City of Grand-Mre.[1209]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Nicolet-Sud from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Jean-Baptiste-de-Nicolet.[1210]
        • Creation of the Village of Albanel from territories taken from the Township of Albanel.[1211]
      • 23 May:
        • Creation of the Village of Lac-Bouchette from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Thomas-dAquin.[1212]
        • Creation of the Village of Plage-Laval from territories taken from the Municipality of Sainte-Rose.[1213]
      • 31 May: The Township of Maniwaki became a Village.[1214]
      • 2 August: Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Monique from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Henri-de-Taillon.[1215]
      • 6 September: Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Thrse-de-Gasp from territories taken from the Municipality of Anse-du-Cap.[1216]
      • 15 October: Creation of the Municipality of La Manaza from territories taken from the Township of Marchand.[1217]
      • 20 December: Creation of the Village of Mistassini from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Michel-de-Mistassini.[1218]

      1931[edit]

      • 7 March: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Sraphine from territories taken from the Municipality of Kingsey, the Parish of Saint-Albert-de-Warwick, the Parish of Sainte-Clothilde-de-Horton and the Parish of Sainte-Elizabeth-de-Warwick.[1219]
      • 25 April: The Municipality of Lacaille changed its name to Bellerive.[1220]
      • 9 May: Creation of the Village of Saint-Joseph-de-la-Rive from territories taken from the Parish of LAssomption-de-la-Sainte-Vierge.[1221]
      • 16 May: The Municipality of Bouchette-Sud changed its name to Blue Sea.[1222]
      • 21 May: The Village of Sacr-Cur-de-Jsus became the Municipality of East Broughton.[1223]
      • 4 July: The Township of Saint-Paul-de-Mille-Vaches became the Municipality Saint-Paul-du-Nord.[1224]
      • 11 July: The Village of Cowansville became a Town.[1225]
      • 25 July: The Village of Sainte-Ccile is annexed by the City of Salaberry-de-Valleyfield.[1226]
      • 10 October: Creation of the Village of Maskinong from territories taken from the Municipality of Maskinong.[1227]
      • 24 October:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Mtabetchouan from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Louis-de-Chambord.[1228]
        • The Parish of Saint-Octave-de-Mtis became the Municipality of Grand-Mtis.[1229]
        • The Municipality of Saint-Octave-de-Mtis-Sud became the Parish of Saint-Octave-de-Mtis.[1229]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Stanislas from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Michel-de-Mistassini and other unorganized territories.[1230]
        • The Parish of Cur-Trs-Pur-de-la-Bienheureuse-Vierge-Marie-de-Plaisance became the Municipality of Plaisance.[1229]
      • 31 October: Creation of the Village of Avenir from territories taken from the Municipality of L'Avenir.[1231]
      • 19 December: Creation of the Village of Grande-Rivire from territories taken from the Municipality of Grande-Rivire.[1232]
      • 26 December: The Municipality of Talon changed its name to Lac-Frontire.[1233]

      1932[edit]

      • 2 January: Creation of the Municipality of Mont-Lebel from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Blandine.[1234]
      • 23 January: Creation of the Municipality of Ogden from territories taken from the Township of Stanstead.[1235]
      • 6 February:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Grande-le from territories taken from the Municipality of Nouveau-Salaberry.[1236]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Agricole from territories taken from the Township of Wolfe.[1237]
      • 19 February:
        • The Municipality of Jeanne-dArc is annexed by the Municipality of Sainte-Monique.[1238]
        • The Municipality of Metgermette-Nord changed its name to Sainte-Aurlie.[1239]
        • The Village of Plage-Laval became a Town.[1240]
        • The Township of Metgermette-Nord became the Municipality of Saint-Zacharie.[1239]
      • 16 April:
        • The Parish of Saint-Louis-de-Chambord became the Village of Chambord.[1241]
        • The Township of MacNider became the Municipality of Baie-des-Sables.[1242]
      • 11 June: Creation of the Municipality of Petite-Rivire-Ouest from territories taken from the Municipality of Grande-Rivire.[1243]
      • 16 July: Creation of the Municipality of Stanstead-Est from territories taken from the Township of Stanstead.[1244]
      • 29 October: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Flix-de-Dalquier from territories taken from the United Townships of Figuery-et-Dalquier.[1245]
      • 12 November: The Municipality of Petite-Rivire-Ouest changed its name to Grande-Rivire-Ouest.[1246]
      • 24 November: The Municipality of Bishop's Crossing changed its name to Bishopton.[1247]

      1933[edit]

      • 21 January: Creation of the Municipality of Taschereau-Fortier from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Maxime.[1248]
      • 4 February: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Franois-Ouest from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Franois.[1249]
      • 11 March:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Bridgeville from territories taken from the Municipality of Perc and the Parish of Saint-Pierre-de-la-Malbaie-Numro-Un.[1250]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Sbastien from territories taken from the Township of Aylmer.[1251]
      • 13 April:
        • Creation of the Town of Duparquet.[1252]
        • Creation of the Town of Val-Saint-Michel from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Grard-Magella.[1253]
      • 5 August: The Township of Fox became the Municipality of Rivire-au-Renard.[1254]
      • 9 September: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Adelme from territories taken from the Municipality of Matane and the Parish of Sainte-Flicit.[1255]
      • 18 November: Creation of the Village of Gatineau from territories taken from the Municipality of Templeton-Ouest.[1256]

      1934[edit]

      • 13 February: The Municipality of Mtabetchouan became the Parish of Saint-Louis-de-Chambord.[1257]
      • 20 April: Creation of the Town of Bourlamaque.[1258]

      1935[edit]

      • 16 February: Creation of the Municipality of Clermont from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-tienne-de-Murray-Bay and the Parish of Sainte-Agns.[1259]
      • 6 March: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Denis-de-Brompton from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-lie-dOrford, the Parish of Saint-Franois-Xavier-de-Brompton, the Township of Brompton and the Township of Orford.[1260]
      • 11 April: Creation of the Township of De Sales.[1261]
      • 13 April: The Municipality of Anse-du-Cap changed its name to Cap-dEspoir.[1262]
      • 18 June: The Village of Sainte-Genevive is annexed by the Village of Sainte-Genevive-de-Pierrefonds.[1263]
      • 13 July: Creation of the Village of Brownsburg from territories taken from the Township of Chatham.[1264]
      • 31 August: Creation of the Village of Val-dOr.[1265]
      • 14 September: Creation of the Village of Stukely-Sud from territories taken from the Municipality of South-Stukely.[1266]

      1936[edit]

      • 10 January: The Town of Drummondville became a City.[1267]
      • 4 March: Creation of the Township of Clermont.
      • 21 March: Creation of the Village of Saint-Augustin from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Augustin.[1268]
      • 23 May: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Bernard-de-lle-aux-Coudres from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Louis-de-lIsle-aux-Coudres.[1269]
      • 10 June: Creation of the Town of Lac-Saint-Joseph from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Catherine.[1270]
      • 15 August: Creation of the Municipality of Duhamel from territories taken from the United Townships of Hartwell-et-Preston.[1271]
      • 31 October: Creation of the Municipality of Grantham-Ouest from territories taken from the Township of Grantham.[1272]
      • 21 November: Creation of the Municipality of Hope-Est from territories taken from the Township of Hope.[1273]

      1937[edit]

      • 21 January: Creation of the Municipality of Sacr-Coeur-de-Jsus-Village from territories taken from the Parish of Sacr-Coeur-de-Jsus.[1274]
      • 30 January: Creation of the Municipality of Beauport-Ouest from territories taken from the Municipality of Beauport.[1275]
      • 6 March: Creation of the Village of La Sarre from territories taken from the Township of La Sarre.[1276]
      • 29 April: Creation of the Township of Sicotte.
      • 8 May: The Village of Asbestos became a Town.[1277]
      • 20 May:
        • Creation of the Town of Baie-Comeau.[1278]
        • The Village of Val-d'Or became a Town.[1279]
      • 31 July: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Paul-de-Chteauguay from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Martine.[1280]
      • 7 August: Creation of the Municipality of Ascot-Nord from territories taken from the Township of Ascot.[1281]
      • 19 August: The Village of Saint-Joseph-de-Grantham became a Town.[1282]
      • 18 September: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Simon-de-Drummond from territories taken from the Township of Grantham and the Township of Wickham.[1283]
      • 30 October: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Catherine-dAlexandrie-de-Laprairie from territories taken from the Municipality of Laprairie and the Parish of Saint-Constant.[1284]
      • 13 November:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Sophie from territories taken from the Township of Halifax-Nord.[1285]
        • Creation of the Parish of Tadoussac from territories taken from the Parish of Sacr-Coeur-de-Jsus.[1286]
      • 4 December: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Tharcisius from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Benot-Joseph-Labre and other unorganized territories.[1287]
      • 28 December: The Village of Saint-Jrme-de-Matane became the Town of Matane.[1288]

      1938[edit]

      • 19 February: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Janvier.[1289]
      • 14 May:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Grand-Saint-Esprit from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Monique.[1290]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Lambert from territories taken from the United Townships of La Reine-et-Desmeloizes.[1291]
      • 11 June: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Marc-du-Lac-Long.[1292]
      • 30 July: The Municipality of Roquemaure changed its name to Sainte-Jeanne-de-Clerval.[1293]
      • 3 September: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Edmond from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Thomas-Didyme, the Township of Normandin and other unorganized territories.[1294]
      • 5 November: Creation of the Municipality of Austin from territories taken from the Municipality of Bolton-Est.[1295]
      • 19 November:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Rivire-Malbaie from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-tienne-de-Murray-Bay.[1296]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Elzar from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-David-dEscourt and the Parish of Saint-Louis-du-Ha! Ha!.[1297]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Clothilde-de-Beauce from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-phrem-de-Tring, the Municipality of Saint-Victor-de-Tring, the Parish of Sacr-Cur-de-Jsus and the Parish of Sacr-Cur-de-Marie.[1298]
      • 26 November: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Joseph-de-Beauce from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-la-Beauce.[1299]

      1939[edit]

      • 21 January: Creation of the Village of Les Becquets from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Pierre-les-Becquets.[1300]
      • 28 January: Creation of the Village of Deschaillons-sur-Saint-Laurent from territories taken from the Village of Deschaillons.[1301]
      • 16 March: Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Benot-du-Lac from territories taken from the Municipality of Austin.[1302]
      • 30 March: The Village of Fermont is annexed by the Parish of Saint-Maurice.[1303]
      • 1 April: Creation of the Municipality of Val-Saint-Gilles from territories taken from the Township of Clermont.[1304]
      • 28 April: Creation of the Town of Malartic.[1305]
      • 29 April: Creation of the Village of Saint-Pascal from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Paschal-de-Kamouraska.[1306]
      • 27 May:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-tienne-de-Bolton from territories taken from the Municipality of Bolton-Est.[1307]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Gabriel-Lalemant from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Pacme.[1308]
      • 17 June: Creation of the Village of Rimouski-Est from territories taken from the Town of Rimouski and the Parish of Saint-Anaclet-de-Lessard.[1309]
      • 23 June: The Township of Howard became the Municipality of Saint-Adolphe-dHoward.[1310]
      • 19 August: Creation of the Municipality of Grosses-Roches from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Flicit.[1311]

      1940[edit]

      • 2 March: The Municipality of Partie-Sud-du-Canton-de-Masham changed its name to Sainte-Ccile-de-Masham.[1312]
      • 17 May: Creation of the Municipality of Mont-Tremblant from territories taken from the Township of Clyde and the United Townships of DeSalaberry-et-Grandison.[1313]
      • 1 June: The Township of Armand became the Municipality of Saint-Honor.[1314]
      • 8 June: Creation of the Village of Saint-Sylvre from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Sylvre.[1315]
      • 27 July: Creation of the Village of Norbertville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Norbert-dArthabaska.[1316]
      • 26 October: Creation of the Municipality of Chute-Saint-Philippe from territories taken from the Parish of Ferme-Neuve and other unorganized territories.[1317]
      • 21 December: Creation of the Village of Cadillac and the Village of Pascalis.[1318]

      1941[edit]

      • 4 January: Creation of the Village of La Patrie from territories taken from the Township of Ditton.[1319]
      • 20 March: Creation of the Town of Ville-des-Iles-Laval from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Dorothe.[1320]
      • 10 May: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Hlne-de-Mancebourg.[1321]
      • 20 September: Creation of the Village of Saint-Flix from territories taken from the Municipality of Grantham-Ouest.[1322]
      • 15 November: The Village of Saint-Flix is annexed by the Municipality of Grantham-Ouest.[1322]

      1942[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Re-Creation of the Village of Saint-Flix from territories taken from the Municipality of Grantham-Ouest.[1323]
        • Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Rose-du-Nord from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Fulgence.[1324]
      • 13 May: Creation of the Town of Belleterre.[1325]
      • 29 May:
        • The Town of Berthier changed its name to Berthierville.[1326]
        • Creation of the Town of Oka-sur-le-Lac from territories taken from the Municipality of LAnnonciation.[1327]
      • 27 June: The Township of Grantham became the Municipality of Saint-Jean-Baptiste.[1328]
      • 29 August: The Municipality of Nord-Est-des-Cantons-de-Wabassee-Dudley-et-Bouthiller changed its name to Nord-Est-des-Cantons-Dudley-et-Bouthiller.[1329]
      • 26 December: The Village of Saint-Joseph became the Town of Saint-Joseph-de-Sorel.[1330]

      1943[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Georges-Ouest from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Georges.[1331]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Mathieu from territoires taken from the United Townships of Figuery-et-Dalquier and other unorganized territories.[1332]
        • Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Odile-sur-Rimouski from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Germain-de-Rimouski.[1333]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saints-Martyrs-Canadiens from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Fortunat-de-Wolfeston, the Parish of Saint-Jacques-le-Majeur-de-Wolfeston, the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-Ham-Sud, the Township of Garthby and the Township of Ham-Nord.[1334]
      • 3 July: The Village of Saint-Flix changed its name to Drummondville-Ouest.[1335]

      1944[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Janvier-de-Joly from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-douard-de-Lotbinire.[1336]
        • Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Praxde from territories taken from the Municipality of DIsrali, the Municipality of Lambton and the Township of Stratford.[1337]
        • Creation of the Village of Naudville from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Joseph-dAlma.[1338]
      • 22 January: The Town of Racine is annexed by the City of Arvida.[1339]
      • 26 February: The Township of Wolfe became the Municipality of Saint-Faustin.[1340]
      • 4 May: Creation of the Town of Forestville from territories taken from the United Townships of Sainte-Anne-de-Portneuf.[1341]
      • 30 June:
        • The Municipality of Durham changed its name to Ulverton.[1342]
        • The Village of Saint-Jean-Baptiste-de-Blisle changed its name to Val-David.[1343]
      • 14 October: The Municipality of Cap-des-Rosiers changed its name to Grande-Grve.[1344]
      • 21 October: The Municipality of Nouveau-Salaberry is annexed by the City of Salaberry-de-Valleyfield.[1345]
      • 10 November: The Township of Wickham became the Municipality of Saint-Nicphore.[1346]

      1945[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Normtal from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Jacques-de-Dupuy and the Parish of Saint-Lambert.[1347]
        • Creation of the Village of Crabtree from territories taken from the Parish of Sacr-Cur-de-Jsus.[1348]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Ren.[1349]
      • 20 January: The Municipality of Beauport changed its name to Sainte-Thrse-de-Lisieux.[1350]
      • 7 April: The United Townships of Wabassee-Dudley-et-Bouthillier became the Municipality of Notre-Dame-de-Pontmain.[1351]
      • 24 May:
        • Creation of the Village of Angliers from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Eugne-de-Guigues and the Township of Gurin.[1352]
        • The Village of Petit-Lac-Magog changed its name to Deauville.[1353]
      • 2 June: The Village of Priceville changed its name to Price.[1354]
      • 16 June: The Village of Saint-Mose changed its name to Saint-Nol.[1355]
      • 30 June: The Parish of Saint-Mthode-d'Adstock became the Municipality of Saint-Mthode-de-Frontenac.[1356]
      • 1 July: The Village of Mont-Joli became a Town.[1357]

      1946[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Barnston-Ouest from territories taken from the Township of Barnston.[1358]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Colombier from territories taken from the United Townships of Sainte-Anne-de-Portneuf.[1359]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Jean-de-Brbeuf from territories taken from the Municipality of Inverness, the Township of Halifax-Sud, the Township of Ireland-Nord and the Township of Leeds.[1360]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Thrse-de-la-Gatineau from territories taken from the Township of Cameron.[1361]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Thrse-Ouest from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Thrse-de-Blainville.[1362]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Germain-de-Grantham from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Germain.[1363]
      • 2 February: The United Townships of Bigelow-Wells-Blake-et-McGill became the Municipality of Notre-Dame-du-Laus.[1364]
      • 9 February: The Township of Somerset-Sud became the Parish of Plessisville.[1365]
      • 28 March: The Parish of Sainte-Jeanne-Chantal-de-l'Isle-Perrot changed its name to le-Perrot.
      • 27 April: The Township of Clyde became the Municipality of La Conception.[1366]
      • 22 June: The Village of Montmorency became a Town.[1367]
      • 1 July: Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Anne-des-Lacs from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Sauveur.[1368]
      • 24 August: The Municipality of Saint-Joseph-de-Beauce changed its name to Saint-Joseph-des-rables.[1369]
      • 31 August: The Township of Clifton became the Municipality of Martinville.[1370]
      • 5 October: The Parish of Sainte-Thodosie changed its name to Sainte-Thodosie-Calixa-Lavalle.[1371]
      • 26 October: The Village of Saint-Flicien became a Town.[1372]
      • 16 November: The Village of Gatineau became a Town.[1373]

      1947[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Biencourt.[1374]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Douville from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Hyacinthe.[1375]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Lac-Saint-Charles from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-des-Laurentides.[1376]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Franoise from territories taken from the Municipality of Villeroy and the Parish of Sainte-Philomne-de-Fortierville.[1377]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Shannon from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Catherine.[1378]
        • Creation of the Village of Mont-Saint-Pierre from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Maxime-du-Mont-Louis.[1379]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Fulgence from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Fulgence.[1380]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Grgoire-de-Greenlay from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Franois-Xavier-de-Brompton.[1381]
        • Creation of the Village of Sainte-Dorothe from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Dorothe.[1382]
        • Creation of the Village of Sault-au-Mouton from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Paul-du-Nord.[1383]
        • Creation of the Parish of Rosemre from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Thrse-de-Blainville.[1384]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Georges-Est from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Georges.
      • 1 February: The Village of Saint-Faustin-Station changed its name to Lac-Carr.[1385]
      • 20 March: Creation of the Village of Parent.[1386]
      • 26 April: The Village of Loretteville became a Town.[1387]
      • 10 May:
        • The Municipality of Pont-Viau became a Town.[1388]
        • The Village of L'Abord--Plouffe became a Town.[1389]
        • The Parish of Longueuil is split into the Town of Jacques-Cartier and the Town of Mackayville.[1390]
        • The Parish of Saint-Colomb-de-Sillery became the City of Sillery.[1391]
      • 7 June: The Township of Bgon became the Municipality of Saint-Jean-de-Dieu.[1392]
      • 18 October: The Municipality of Sainte-Florence-de-Beaurivage changed its name to Sainte-Florence.[1393]
      • 29 November: The Village of Mistassini became a Town.[1394]
      • 13 December: The Municipality of Ouest-du-Canton-de-la-Motte changed its name to La Motte.[1395]

      1948[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of vain.[1396]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Lac-des-Aigles.[1397]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Lantier from territories taken from the Township of Doncaster.
        • Creation of the Municipality of Lesage from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Jrme, the Village of Shawbridge and the Township of Abercrombie.[1398]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Raudot.[1399]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-David-de-Falardeau from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Honor.[1400]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Jacques-de-Horton from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Clothilde-de-Horton.[1401]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Ludger-de-Milot.[1402]
        • Creation of the Village of Barraute from territories taken from the United Townships of Fiedmont-et-Barraute.[1403]
        • Creation of the Village of Notre-Dame-de-Lorette from territories taken from the Parish of Ancienne-Lorette.[1404]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Basile-Sud from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Basile.[1405]
        • The Parish of le-Perrot is split into the Municipality of le-Perrot-Nord and the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-l'le-Perrot.
        • The Township of Senneterre became a Village.[1406]
      • 7 February: The Township of De Sales became the Municipality of Notre-Dame-des-Monts.[1407]
      • 11 March:
        • Creation of the City of Rouyn by the merger of the Town of Mercier and the Town of Rouyn.[1408]
        • Creation of the Town of Prville from territories taken from the Town of Jacques-Cartier.[1409]
        • The Village of Cadillac became a Town.[1410]
        • The Village of Saint-Eustache became a Town.[1411]
      • 22 March:
        • The Town of Beauharnois became a City.[1412]
        • The Town of Noranda became a City.[1413]
      • 17 April: The Village of Est-de-Saint-Georges-de-Beauce became the Town of Saint-Georges.[1414]
      • 29 May: The Village of Saint-Benot-Joseph-Labre changed its name to Amqui.[1415]
      • 1 June:
        • Creation of the Town of Chteauguay Heights from territories taken from the Town of Chteauguay.[1416]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Milan from territories taken from the Municipality of Winslow-Sud, the Township of Hampden, the Township of Lingwick, the Township of Marston and the Township of Whitton.[1417]
      • 1 July: Creation of the Municipality of Lanoraie-d'Autray from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-Lanoraie.[1418]
      • 18 September:
        • The Village of Almaville changed its name to Shawinigan-Sud.[1419]
        • The Village of Saint-Georges-Ouest became a Town.[1420]
        • The Parish of Saint-Malachie-de-Frampton changed its name to Saint-Malachie.[1421]
      • 13 November: The Township of Bois became the Municipality of Rivire--Pierre.[1422]

      1949[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • The Municipality of Clermont became a Village.[1423]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Jules from territories taken from the Township of Maria and other unorganized territories.[1424]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Mdard.[1425]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Robert-Bellarmin from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Gdon and the United Townships of Risborough-et-Marlow.[1426]
        • Creation of the Village of Notre-Dame-du-Lac from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Lac.[1427]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Maurice-de-Bois-Filion from territories taken from the Municipality of Terrebonne and the Parish of Sainte-Thrse-de-Blainville.[1428]
        • Creation of the Village of Sainte-Jeanne-dArc from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Jeanne-dArc.[1429]
        • Creation of the Village of Sainte-Rosalie from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Rosalie.[1430]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Antoine-des-Laurentides from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Jrme.[1431]
      • 26 February: The United Townships of La Reine-et-Desmeloizes became the Municipality of La Reine.[1432]
      • 10 March:
        • Creation of the Town of LeMoyne from territories taken from the Town of Jacques-Cartier.[1433]
        • Creation of the Village of Fossambault-sur-le-Lac from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Catherine.[1434]
        • The Parish of Saint-Foye became the Town of Sainte-Foy.[1435]
      • 9 April: The Parish of Tadoussac is closed and dissolved.[1436]
      • 23 April: The Parish of Saint-Jean-Baptiste-des-cureuils became the Municipality of Les cureuils.[1437]
      • 30 April: The Village of Saint-Maurice-de-Bois-Filion changed its name to Bois-des-Filions.[1438]
      • 18 June: The United Townships of Figuery-et-Dalquier became the Municipality of Amos-Ouest.[1439]
      • 1 July:
        • Creation of the Village of Sainte-Anne-du-Lac from territories taken from the Parish of Sacr-Cur-de-Marie.[1440]
        • Creation of the Parish of Lac-Par from territories taken from the Township of Chertsey.[1441]
      • 9 July: The Village of Saint-variste-Station changed its name to Guadeloupe.[1442]
      • 10 September: The Village of Enfant-Jsus became the Municipality of Valle-Jonction.[1443]
      • 17 September: The Village of La Sarre became a Town.[1444]
      • 5 November: The Village of Charlesbourg became a City.[1445]
      • 12 November: The Village of Saint-Rmi became a Town.[1446]
      • 24 December: The Township of Senneterre became a Parish.[1447]

      1950[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Compton-Station from territories taken from the Township of Compton.[1448]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Lac-des-Plages from territories taken from the Township of Amherst and the United Townships of Suffolk-et-Addington.[1449]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Mont-Saint-Hilaire from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Hilaire.
        • Creation of the Municipality of Notre-Dame-de-la-Merci.[1450]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Aim-des-Lacs from territories taken from the Municipality of Notre-Dame-des-Monts and the Parish of Saint-Agns.[1451]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Alfred from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Franois-Ouest, the Municipality of Saint-Victor-de-Tring and the Parish of Saint-Benot-Labre.[1452]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-douard from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Didace, the Parish of Saint-Justin and the Parish of Sainte-Ursule.[1453]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Franois-Xavier-de-Viger from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-piphane and the Parish of Saint-Hubert.[1454]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Luc-de-Laval from territories taken from the United Townships of Sainte-Anne-de-Portneuf.[1455]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Simon-les-Mines from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Benjamin, the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-la-Providence, the Parish of Saint-Franois and the Parish of Saint-Georges-Est.[1456]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Flicit from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Pamphile, the Municipality of Sainte-Perptue and the United Townships of Casgrain-et-Leverrier.[1457]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Val-Alain from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Emmlie-de-Lotbinire.[1458]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Venise-en-Qubec from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Georges-de-Clarenceville.[1459]
        • Creation of the Village of Armagh from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Cajetan-dArmagh.[1460]
        • Creation of the Village of Cap-aux-Meules from territories taken from the Municipality of tang-du-Nord.[1461]
        • Creation of the Village of LIslet-Station from territories taken from the Municipality of Islet.[1462]
        • Creation of the Village of Marsoui from territories taken from the Municipality of Christie and the Municipality of Duchesnay.[1463]
        • The Village of Mont-Laurier became a Town.
        • Creation of the Village of Pincourt from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-l'le-Perrot.
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Gdon from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Gdon.[1464]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Placide from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Placide.[1465]
        • Creation of the Village of Sainte-Anne-du-Lac from territories taken from the Township of Dcarie.[1466]
      • 29 March:
        • Creation of the Town of Hauterive.[1467]
        • Creation of the Municipality of La Rochelle from territories taken from the Municipality of Tingwick.[1468]
        • The Parish of Saint-Lonard-de-Port-Maurice became the Municipality of Saint-Lonard-de-Portneuf.[1469]
      • 1 April: The Township of Morin became the Municipality of Morin-Heights.[1470]
      • 5 April:
        • The Town of Magog became a City.[1471]
        • The Town of Saint-Jrme became a City.[1472]
      • 6 May: The Parish of Sainte-Rose-de-Lima changed its name to Sainte-Rose-Est.[1473]
      • 8 July: The Municipality of Figuery-et-Dalquier changed its name to Amos-Est.[1474]
      • 25 November: The Township of Somerset-Nord became the Municipality of Sainte-Julie.[1475]

      1951[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • The Town of Plage-Laval changed its name to Laval-Ouest.[1476]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Havre-Aubert-Est from territories taken from the Municipality of Havre-Aubert.[1477]
        • Creation of the Municipality of La Baleine from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Louis-de-lIsle-aux-Coudres.[1478]
        • Creation of the Municipality of La Nativit-de-Laprairie from territories taken from the Municipality of Laprairie.[1479]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Lac-douard.[1480]
        • Creation of the Village of Aston-Jonction from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Raphal.[1481]
        • Creation of the Village of Deschambault from territories taken from the Municipality of Deschambault.[1482]
        • Creation of the Village of Laurier-Station from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Flavien.[1483]
      • 17 February: The United Townships of Fiedmont-et-Barraute became a Municipality.[1484]
      • 7 March: Creation of the Village of Chute-aux-Outardes and the Parish of Ragueneau from territories taken from the Municipality of Sept-Cantons-Unis-de-Saguenay.[1485]
      • 14 March: Creation of the Town of Sept-les from territories taken from the Township of Letellier.[1486]
      • 17 March: The Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Bonsecours became the Municipality of Fassett.[1487]
      • 28 April: The Municipality of Sainte-Jeanne-de-Clerval changed its name to Clerval.[1488]
      • 12 May: The Municipality of Saindon became the Village of Sayabec.[1489]
      • 16 June: The Village of Beauport-Est changed its name to Villeneuve.[1490]
      • 27 October: The Township of Abercrombie became the Parish of Saint-Hippolyte.[1491]
      • 19 December:
        • The Town of Jacques-Cartier became a City.[1492]
        • The Town of Lauzon became a City.[1493]
        • The Village of Cte-Saint-Luc became a Town.[1494]

      1952[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Fleuriault from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Gabriel.[1495]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Les Boules from territories taken from the Municipality of Baie-des-Sables and the Parish of Saint-Octave-de-Mtis.[1496]
        • The Municipality of Notre-Dame-des-Quinze-du-Canton-Guigues is annexed by the Municipality of Notre-Dame-du-Nord.[1497]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Pabos Mills from territories taken from the Municipality of Newport and the Municipality of Pabos.[1498]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Roquemaure.[1499]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Jean-Baptiste-de-lIsle-Verte from territories taken from the Municipality of Isle-Verte.[1500]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Terrasse-Vaudreuil from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-l'le-Perrot.
        • Creation of the Village of Ayersville from territories taken from the Township of Chatham.[1501]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Damase from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Damase.[1502]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Jean-Vianney from territories taken from the Municipality of Shipshaw.[1503]
      • 23 January:
        • Creation of the Town of Saint-Vincent-de-Paul from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Vincent-de-Paul.[1504]
        • The Village of Chambly became the Town of Fort-Chambly.[1505]
      • 9 March: The Town of Ville-Saint-Michel became the City of Saint-Michel.[1506]
      • 10 May: The United Townships of Royal-Roussillon-et-Poularies became the Municipality of Royal-Roussillon-de-Macamic.[1507]
      • 27 September: The United Townships of Dalibaire-et-Romieu became the Municipality of Les Mchins.[1508]
      • 25 October: The Village of Bassin-de-Chambly became the Town of Chambly.[1509]
      • 31 October: The Municipality of Laprairie changed its name to Notre-Dame.[1510]
      • 8 November: Creation of the Village of Chibougamau.[1511]
      • 6 December: The Municipality of La-Nativit-de-Laprairie became the Parish of Laprairie.[1512]

      1953[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Charlesbourg-Ouest from territories taken from the Parish of Charlesbourg.[1513]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Moffet from territories taken from the United Townships of Latulipe-et-Gaboury and other unorganized territories.[1514]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Monique-des-Saules from territories taken from the Parish of Ancienne-Lorette.[1515]
        • Creation of the Village of Lac--la-Croix from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Croix.[1516]
        • Creation of the Village of Omerville from territories taken from the Township of Magog.[1517]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Honor from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Honor.[1518]
        • Creation of the Village of Shawinigan-Est from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Flore.[1519]
        • Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Irne from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Benot-Joseph-Labre and other unorganized territories.[1520]
      • 31 January: The Parish of Saint-Hilaire became the Municipality of Otterburn Park.[1521]
      • 12 February: Creation of the Village of Pointe-Calumet from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Joseph.[1522]
      • 21 March:
        • The Municipality of Nord-Est-des-Cantons-Dudley-et-Bouthiller changed its name to Saint-Aim-du-Lac-des-les.[1523]
        • The Parish of Annonciation became the Municipality of Oka.[1524]
      • 28 March: The Township of Campbell became the Municipality of Brunet.[1525]
      • 2 May:
        • The Village of Lac-Saint-Louis changed its name to Melocheville.[1526]
        • The Parish of Sainte-Anne-de-Stukely became the Municipality of Sainte-Anne-de-la-Rochelle.[1527]
      • 23 May: The Township of Est-du-Canton-de-Campbell became the Municipality of Lac-des-corces.[1528]
      • 20 June: The Village of Saint-Alexis-de-la-Grande-Baie is annexed by the Town of Port-Alfred.[1529]
      • 4 July: The Parish of Charlesbourg changed its name to Orsainville.[1530]
      • 18 July: Creation of the Town of Murdochville.[1531]
      • 25 July: The Parish of Saint-Pierre-de-la-Malbaie-Numro-Un became the Municipality of Barachois.[1532]
      • 15 August: The Township of Romieux became the Municipality of Capucins.[1533]
      • 12 September: The Municipality of D'Israli became the Parish of Disreali.[1534]
      • 19 September: Creation of the Town of Barville from territories taken from the Municipality of Fiedmont-et-Barraute.[1535]
      • 3 October: The Township of Lussier became the Municipality of Saint-Donat.[1536]
      • 24 October:
        • The Municipality of Musselyville changed its name to Saint-Alphonse.[1537]
        • The Municipality of Portland changed its name to Portland-Ouest.[1538]
      • 28 November:
        • The Municipality of Hope-Est changed its name to Hope Town.[1539]
        • The Village of D'Israli changed its name to Disraeli.[1540]
      • 5 December:
        • The Municipality of Partie-Ouest-du-Canton-de-Douglas changed its name to Haldimand.[1541]
        • The Municipality of Saint-Jean-lEvangliste changed its name to Nouvelle.[1541]
      • 17 December: Creation of the Town of Saint-Martin from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Martin.[1542]

      1954[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Auclair.[1543]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Michel-des-Forges from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-tienne and the Parish of Trois-Rivires.[1544]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Omer from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Pamphile and the Municipality of Sainte-Perptue.[1545]
        • Creation of the Parish of Sainte-Germaine-de-Palmarolle from territories taken from the Municipality of Palmarolle and the Municipality of Poularies.[1546]
      • 28 January: The Municipality of Rivire-des-Prairies became a Town.[1547]
      • 10 February:
        • The Village of Giffard became a City.[1548]
        • The Parish of La Prsentation-de-la-Sainte-Vierge changed its name to Cte-de-Liesse.[1549]
        • The Parish of Saint-Joseph became the Town of Tracy.[1550]
      • 1 April: The Parish of Saint-Laurent is dissolved and its territory is split between the City of Montral and the Town of Saint-Laurent.
      • 10 April: The Town of Saint-Joseph-dAlma changed its name to Alma.[1551]
      • 1 May: Creation of the Parish of Saint-Jean-de-Cherbourg, the Parish of Saint-Paulin-Dalibaire and the Parish of Saint-Thomas-de-Cherbourg from territories taken from an unorganized territory formed from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Flicit, the former Township of Romieux and the former United Township of Dalibaire-et-Romieu.[1552]
      • 15 May:
        • The Village of Naudville became a Town.[1553]
        • The Parish of Conversion-de-Saint-Paul became the Municipality of Saint-Paul.[1554]
        • The United Townships of Roux-Bellechasse-et-Daaquam became the Municipality of Saint-Magloire-de-Bellechasse.[1554]
      • 22 May:
        • The Village of LIslet-Station changed its name to Isletville.[1555]
        • The Village of Sainte-Anne-de-Chicoutimi became the Town of Chicoutimi-Nord.[1556]
        • The Parish of Sainte-Germaine-de-Palmarolle became the Municipality of Sainte-Germaine-Boul.[1557]
      • 19 June: The Township of Bowman became a Municipality.[1558]
      • 7 August: The Municipality of Bagotville-Partie-Nord-Ouest-du-Township-de-Bagot became the Parish of Bagotville.[1559]
      • 1 September: The Village of Chibougamau became a Town.[1560]
      • 18 September: The Parish of Saint-Malachy became the Municipality of Mayo.[1561]
      • 31 December: The Township of Kilkenny became the Municipality of Saint-Calixte.[1562]

      1955[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • The Municipality of Isle-Verte became the Village of LIsle-Verte.[1563]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Lac-du-Cerf from territories taken from the Municipality of Notre-Dame-de-Pontmain and the Municipality of Saint-Aim-du-Lac-des-les.[1564]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Moisie from territories taken from the Township of Letellier.[1565]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Petit-Pabos from territories taken from the Municipality of Pabos and the Municipality of Saint-Franois-de-Pabos.[1566]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Rapides-des-Joachims from territories taken from the Township of Sheen.[1567]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Athanase.[1568]
        • Creation of the Village of Baie-Trinit and the Village of Godbout from territories taken from the Municipality of Sept-Cantons-Unis-de-Saguenay.[1569]
        • Creation of the Village of East Broughton Station from territories taken from the Municipality of East Broughton.[1570]
        • Creation of the Village of Lac-des-corces from territories taken from the Municipality of Lac-des-corces.[1571]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Andr from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Andr.[1572]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Elzar from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Elzar-de-Linire.[1573]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Grgoire from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Grgoire-le-Grand.[1574]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Jean-Eudes from territories taken from the Municipality of Chicoutimi.[1575]
        • Creation of the Village of Sainte-Flicit from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Flicit.[1576]
        • Creation of the Village of Yamaska-Est from territories taken from the Village of Saint-Michel.[1577]
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Honor from territories taken from the Township of Shenley.[1578]
      • 10 February:
        • The Town of Saint-Laurent became a City.
        • The Town of Sainte-Foy became a City.[1579]
        • The Municipality of Petite-Rivire became the Town of La Petite-Rivire.[1580]
        • The Village of Macamic became a Town.[1581]
        • The Village of Plessisville became a Town.[1582]
      • 12 February: The Town of Saint-Joseph-de-Grantham is annexed by the City of Drummondville.[1583]
      • 19 February: The Village of Saint-Victor-de-Tring changed its name to Saint-Victor.[1584]
      • 22 February: The Municipality of le-Perrot-Nord became the Town of le-Perrot.
      • 25 June: The Municipality of Saint-Jean-Baptiste is annexed by the City of Drummondville.[1585]
      • 16 July: The United Townships of Sainte-Anne-de-Portneuf became a Municipality.[1586]
      • 1 August: Creation of the Town of Schefferville.[1587]
      • 16 November: Creation of the Town of Chapais. [1588]
      • 31 December:
        • The Parish of Saint-Bonaventure-de-Hamilton became the Municipality of Bonaventure.[1589]
        • The Township of Ashford became the Municipality of Saint-Damase-de-l'Islet.[1590]

      1956[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Petite-Matane from territories taken from the Municipality of Matane and the Parish of Sainte-Flicit.[1591]
        • The Municipality of Saint-mile became a Village.[1592]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Marcelline-de-Kildare from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Ambroise-de-Kildare.[1593]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Antoine-des-Laurentides from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Antoine-des-Laurentides.[1594]
        • Creation of the Parish of La Rdemption.[1595]
      • 21 January:
        • The Village of Senneterre became a Town.[1596]
        • The Village of Warwick became a Town.[1597]
      • 2 February:
        • The Town of Jonquire became a City.[1598]
        • The Village of Villeneuve became a Town.[1599]
        • The Parish of Saint-Elzar-de-Laval became the Town of Saint-Elzar.[1600]
      • 4 February: The Parish of Saint-Placide became the Municipality of Saint-Placide-de-Barn.[1601]
      • 18 February: The Parish of Sainte-Brigide-de-Monnoir became the Municipality of Sainte-Brigide-dIberville.[1602]
      • 23 February:
        • The Town of Dorval became a City.[1603]
        • Creation of the Town of Mont-Gabriel from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Sauveur and the Parish of Sainte-Adle.[1604]
        • The Parish of Saint-Lonard-de-Port-Maurice became the Town of Anjou.[1605]
      • 25 February: The Township of Settrington became the Parish of Saint-Hilarion.[1606]
      • 11 August: The United Townships of Casgrain-et-Leverrier became the Municipality of Saint-Adalbert.[1607]
      • 18 August: The Township of Arago became the Municipality of Saint-Marcel.[1608]
      • 15 September: The Township of Shawenegan became the Parish of Saint-Boniface-de-Shawinigan.[1609]
      • 10 November: The Parish of Saint-Ours-du-Saint-Esprit changed its name to Saint-Esprit.[1610]
      • 15 December:
        • The Municipality of Saint-phrem-de-Tring became the Parish of Saint-phrem-de-Beauce.[1611]
        • The Parish of LAssomption-de-la-Sainte-Vierge became the Municipality of Les boulements.[1612]
      • 19 December: The Town of Farnham became a City.[1613]
      • 29 December: The Town of Roberval became a City.[1614]

      1957[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Aguanish.[1615]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Petite-Valle from territories taken from the Township of Cloridorme.[1616]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Faustin-Sud from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Faustin.[1617]
        • Creatiion of the Municipality of Sainte-Marguerite.[1618]
        • Creation of the Village of Notre-Dame-du-Bon-Conseil from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Bon-Conseil.[1619]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Thophile from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Thophile-de-la-Beauce.[1620]
        • Creation of the Village of Sainte-Marie from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Marie-de-Blandford.[1621]
        • Creation of the Parish of Notre-Dame-des-Prairies and the Parish of Saint-Charles-Borrome-Sud from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Charles-Borromme-du-Village-dIndustrie.[1622]
      • 5 January: The Municipality of Saint-Ours became a Parish.[1623]
      • 21 January: The Village of Rock Island became a Town.[1624]
      • 31 January:
        • Creation of the Town of Candiac from territories taken from the Village of Delson and the Parish of Saint-Constant.[1625]
        • The Parish of Repentigny became a Town.[1626]
      • 9 February:
        • The Parish of Saint-tienne-de-Murray-Bay became the Municipality of Saint-tienne-de-la-Malbaie.[1627]
        • The Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-la-Beauce changed its name to Saint-Joseph-de-Beauce.[1628]
      • 16 February: The Municipality of Wickham-Ouest changed its name to Wickham.[1629]
      • 21 February:
        • The Municipality of Sainte-Rose became the Town of Fabreville.[1630]
        • The Village of Delson became a Town.[1631]
        • The Parish of Saint-Clment is annexed by the City of Beauharnois.[1632]
      • 9 March: The Township of Whitton became the Municipality of Nantes.[1633]
      • 16 March: The Parish of Saint-Paschal-de-Kamouraska became the Municipality of Saint-Pascal.[1634]
      • 23 March: The Parish of Saint-Franois became the Municipality of Saint-Franois-de-Beauce.[1635]
      • 30 March: The Parish of Saint-Charles-Borrome-Sud became the Municipality of Joliette-Sud.[1636]
      • 13 April: The Village of Saint-Raymond became a Town.[1637]
      • 18 May: The Parish of Saint-tienne-de-Lauzon became the Municipality of Saint-tienne.[1638]
      • 25 May: The Municipality of Saint-Norbert-du-Cap-Chatte became the Parish of Saint-Norbert-du-Cap-Chat.[1639]
      • 22 June: The Parish of Saint-Georges became the Municipality of Henryville.[1640]
      • 14 July: The Village of Canrobert changed its name to L'Ange-Gardien.[1641]
      • 27 July: The Parish of Sainte-Jeanne-de-Neuville became the Municipality of Sainte-Jeanne-de-Pont-Rouge.[1642]
      • 31 August: The Village of Shawinigan-Est is annexed by the City of Shawinigan-Falls.[1643]
      • 14 September: The Municipality of Lacorne changed its name to Sainte-Sophie.[1644]
      • 21 September:
        • The Municipality of Escoumains changed its name to Escoumins.[1645]
        • The Parish of Saint-Raymond-de-Pennafort-de-Weedon became the Municipality of Fontainebleau.[1646]
      • 16 October: The Village of Boucherville became a Town.[1647]
      • 26 October: The Parish of Saint-Lon-de-Marston changed its name to Val-Racine.[1648]
      • 16 November: The Municipality of Saint-Vincent-de-Paul changed its name to Duvernay.[1649]
      • 30 November: The Village of Maniwaki became a Town.[1650]
      • 28 December: The Municipality of Saint-Faustin changed its name to Lac-Suprieur.[1651]

      1958[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Town of Pointe-du-Moulin from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-l'le-Perrot.
        • Creation of the Municipality of Lac-Lemoine.[1652]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Guy.[1653]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Laurent from territories taken from the Municipality of Palmarolle and other unorganized territories.[1654]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Wentworth-Nord from territories taken from the Township of Wentworth.[1655]
        • Creation of the Village of Lafontaine from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Jrme.[1656]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Andr-Est from territories taken from the Municipality of Argenteuil.[1657]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Vallier from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Vallier.[1658]
      • 6 February:
        • The City of Shawinigan Falls changed its name to Shawinigan.[1659]
        • The Town of Cte-Saint-Luc became a City.[1660]
        • The Town of Knogami became a City.[1661]
        • The Town of Pointe-aux-Trembles became a City.[1662]
        • The Town of Pointe-Claire became a City.[1663]
        • The Town of Pont-Viau became a City.[1664]
        • The Town of Saint-Martin became a City.[1665]
        • The Town of Ville-Lasalle became the City of Lasalle.[1666]
        • The Municipality of Duvernay became a Town.[1667]
        • The Municipality of Saint-Franois-de-Sales-Isle-Jsus became the Town of Saint-Franois.[1668]
        • The Village of Chandler became a Town.[1669]
        • The Village of Saint-Eustache-sur-le-Lac became a Town.[1670]
        • The Parish of Rosemre became a Town.[1671]
        • The Parish of Saint-Hubert became a Town.[1672]
      • 8 February: The Village of Malbaie became the Town of La Malbaie.[1673]
      • 14 February:
        • The Town of Mgantic changed its name to Lac-Mgantic.[1674]
        • The Parish of Laprairie became the Town of Brossard.[1675]
      • 21 February: The Town of Alma became a City.[1676]
      • 1 April: The Parish of Cte-de-Liesse is dissolved and its territory is split between the City of Dorval, the City of Lachine and the City of Saint-Laurent.[1677]
      • 5 April: The Village of Sainte-Marie became a Town.[1678]
      • 12 April: The Parish of Saint-Raymond-Nonnat changed its name to Saint-Raymond.
      • 14 June:
        • The Village of Danville became a Town.[1679]
        • The United Townships of Carpentier-et-de-Courville became the Municipality of Belcourt.[1680]
      • 28 June: The Village of Bois-des-Filions changed its name to Bois-des-Filion.[1681]
      • 23 August: The Township of Villeneuve became the Municipality of Val-des-Bois.
      • 6 September: The United Townships of Hartwell-et-Preston became the Parish of Chnville.[1682]
      • 13 September: The Parish of Saint-Bruno-de-Montarville became a Town.[1683]
      • 20 September: The Township of Chesham became the Municipality of Notre-Dame-des-Bois.[1684]
      • 18 October: The Township of Marston-Sud became the Municipality of Piopolis.[1685]
      • 22 November: The Township of Aylmer became the Parish of Saint-Sbastien.[1686]
      • 29 November: The Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Lourdes-de-Ham became the Municipality of Massabielle.[1687]
      • 18 December: The Parish of Sainte-Genevive became the Town of Pierrefonds.[1688]

      1959[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Town of Port-Cartier.[1689]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Fatima from territories taken from the Municipality of tang-du-Nord.[1690]
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Janvier-de-la-Croix from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Janvier-de-Blainville.[1691]
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Bernard from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Bernard.[1692]
        • Creation of the Village of Sainte-Germaine-du-Lac-Etchemin from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Germaine-du-Lac-Etchemin.[1693]
      • 10 January: The Township of Hocquart became the Municipality of Saint-Cyprien.[1694]
      • 31 January: The Parish of Sainte-Marie-de-la-Nouvelle-Beauce changed its name to Sainte-Marie.[1695]
      • 11 February:
        • Creation of the Town of Lac-Delage from territories taken from the Municipality of Lac-Saint-Charles and the Municipality of Stoneham.[1696]
        • The Town of Sainte-Thrse became a City.[1697]
        • The Town of Sept-les became a City.[1698]
        • The Village of Gasp became a Town.[1699]
      • 5 March:
        • Creation of the Town of Estrel from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Marguerite-du-Lac-Masson.[1700]
        • The Town of Mackayville became the City of Laflche.[1701]
        • The Town of Montral-Nord became a City.[1702]
        • Creation of the Town of Sainte-Dorothe by the merger of the Village of Sainte-Dorothe and the Parish of Sainte-Dorothe.[1703]
        • Creation of the Village of Lac-Poulin from territories taken from the Town of Saint-Georges, the Village of Saint-Joseph, the Parish of Notre-Dame-de-la-Providence and the Parish of Saint-Benoit-Labre.[1704]
        • The Village of Sainte-Genevive-de-Pierrefonds became the Town of Sainte-Genevive.[1705]
      • 18 April: The United Townships of Spaulding and Ditchfield became the Municipality of Frontenac.[1706]
      • 9 May: The Municipality of Saint-Simon-de-Drummond changed its name to Drummondville-Sud.[1707]
      • 27 June: The Village of La Pointe--Gatineau became the Town of Pointe-Gatineau.[1708]
      • 5 December: The Municipality of Saint-Hubert-de-Spaulding changed its name to Audet.[1709]
      • 12 December:
        • The Municipality of Havre-Aubert changed its name to Bassin.[1710]
        • The Parish of Saint-Valre-de-Bulstrode became the Municipality of Saint-Valre.[1711]

      1960[edit]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Marthe-sur-le-Lac from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Eustache.[1712]
        • The Village of Pincourt became a Town.
        • Creation of the Village of Sainte-Anne-de-la-Pocatire from territories taken from the Municipality of Sainte-Anne-de-la-Pocatire.[1713]
        • Creation of the Village of Sainte-Clothilde-de-Horton from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Clothilde-de-Horton.[1714]
      • 23 January: The Municipality of Templeton-Nord changed its name to Perkins.[1715]
      • 30 January: The Town of Baie-d'Urfe changed its name to Baie-D'Urf.[1716]
      • 4 February:
        • Creation of the Town of Gagnon.[1717]
        • Creation of the Town of Lorraine from territories taken from the Village of Bois-des-Filion and the Parish of Sainte-Thrse-de-Blainville.[1718]
        • The Municipality of Dollard-des-Ormeaux became a Town.[1719]
        • The Parish of Saint-Joachim-de-Chteauguay became the Town of Chteauguay-Centre.[1720]
      • 6 February: The Parish of Saint-Fortunat-de-Wolfestown became the Municipality of Saint-Fortunat.[1721]
      • 10 March: The Municipality of Sainte-Monique-des-Saules became the Town of Ville-Les Saules.[1722]
      • 12 March:
        • The Village of Belle-Plage changed its name to Vaudreuil-sur-le-Lac.[1723]
        • The Village of Saint-Emilien became the Town of Desbiens.[1724]
      • 2 April: The Township of Wolfestown became the Parish of Saint-Julien.[1725]
      • 9 April:
        • The Municipality of Saint-Eugne-de-Grantham changed its name to Saint-Eugne.[1726]
        • The Municipality of Sud-Ouest-du-Canton-de-Ham changed its name to Saint-Adrien.[1727]
      • 7 June: The Indian reserve of Lac-John is created from parts of the Indian reserve of Matimekosh.
      • 18 June: The Village of Sainte-Germaine-du-Lac-Etchemin chnaged its name to Lac-Etchemin.[1728]
      • 23 July: The United Townships of DeSalaberry-et-Grandison became the Parish of Saint-Jovite.[1729]
      • 30 July: The Municipality of Saint-Faustin-Sud changed its name to Saint-Faustin.[1730]
      • 1 October: The Parish of Orsainville became a Town.[1731]

      1961[edit]

      [1732]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Georges-de-Windsor from territories taken from the Township of Saint-Georges-de-Windsor.
        • Creation of the Village of Saint-Zacharie from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Zacharie.
      • 28 January: The Town of Montral-Sud is annexed by the City of Longueuil.
      • 11 February: The Parish of Saint-Martin became the Town of Renaud.
      • 18 February:
        • The Municipality of La Rochelle changed its name to Trois-Lacs.
        • The Municipality of Partie-Est-du-Canton-dEly changed its name to Racine.
        • The Parish of Sainte-Rose-Est became the Town of Auteuil.
      • 22 February: The Town of Chicoutimi-Nord became a City.
      • 24 March:
        • Creation of the Town of De Grasse from territories taken from the Township of Letellier
        • The Municipality of Pointe-Claire became the Town of Kirkland.
      • 1 April: Creation of the City of Chomedey by the merger of the City of Saint-Martin, the Town of L'Abord--Plouffe and the Town of Renaud.
      • 1 May: Creation of the Village of Pointe-des-Cascades from territories taken from the Municipality of Vaudreuil and the Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-Soulanges.
      • 10 June:
        • The Village of Baie-Saint-Paul became a Town.
        • The Parish of Saint-Alphonse-de-Liguori changed its name to Saint-Liguori.
      • 30 June: The Municipality of Massabielle changed its name to Notre-Dame-de-Lourdes-de-Ham.
      • 12 July: The Village of Shawinigan-Sud became a Town.
      • 15 July: The Village of Notre-Dame-de-Portneuf became the Town of Portneuf.
      • 29 July: The Municipality of Royal-Roussillon-de-Macamic became the Parish of Macamic.
      • 18 November: The Municipality of Partie-Est-du-Canton-de-Stukely-Nord changed its name to Bonsecours.
      • 25 November: The Township of Ely-Nord became the Municipality of Maricourt.
      • 9 December: The Village of Amqui became a Town.
      • 30 December:
        • The Municipality of Saint-Michel-des-Forges is annexed by the City of Trois-Rivires.
        • The Village of Sainte-Anne-de-la-Pocatire became the Town of La Pocatire.
        • The Township of Doncaster became the Municipality of Sainte-Lucie.

      1962[edit]

      [1732]

      • 1 January:
        • The Parish of Saint-Boniface-de-Shawinigan is annexed by the Village of Saint-Boniface-de-Shawinigan.
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Eugne-de-Ladrire from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Fabien.
      • 5 January: The Village of Sutton became a Town.
      • 3 February: The Parish of Saint-Nicolas became a Town.
      • 10 February: The Parish of Saint-Isidore-de-Lauzon changed its name to Saint-Isidore.
      • 21 April: The Village of Deux-Rivires changed its name to Saint-Stanislas.
      • 26 May:
        • The Municipality of Bellerive changes its name to Bellerive-sur-le-Lac.
        • The Municipality of Saint-Dominique-du-Lac changed its name to Saint-Juste-du-Lac.
        • The Municipality of Winslow-Nord changed its name to Saint-Romain.
      • 27 June: The Town of Duvernay became a City.
      • 30 June: The Parish of Saint-David-de-l'Aube-Rivire became the Town of Saint-David-de-l'Auberivire.
      • 6 July:
        • The Town of Isle-Maligne, the Town of Naudville and the Town of Riverbend are annexed by the City of Alma.
        • The Town of Laval-des-Rapides became a City.
      • 21 July: The Township of Ely-Partie-Ouest became the Municipality of Bthanie.
      • 28 July: The Village of Cabano became a Town.
      • 1 September: The Township of Farnham-Ouest became the Municipality of Rainville.
      • 8 September: The Municipality of Beaupr became a Town.
      • 10 November: The Town of Saint-Lonard-de-Port-Maurice changed its name to Saint-Lonard.
      • 24 November:
        • The Town of Saint-Elzar changed its name to Vimont.
        • The Village of Saint-Csaire became a Town.
      • 22 December: The Village of Ville-Marie became a Town.

      1963[edit]

      [1732]

      • 2 February: The Town of Beauport became a City.
      • 16 February: The Village of Thurso became a Town.
      • 30 March: The Village of Saint-Hilaire became the Town of Saint-Hilaire-sur-Richelieu.
      • 1 April: Creation of the Town of Matagami.
      • 20 April: The Municipality of Saint-Pamphile became a Town.
      • 27 April: The Town of Saint-Eustache-sur-le-Lac became the City of Deux-Montagnes.
      • 4 May: The Township of Boyer became the Municipality of Saguay.
      • 22 May: The Town of Saint-Lonard became a City.
      • 1 June: The Municipality of Raudot changed its name to Sainte-Rita.
      • 22 June: Creation of the Municipality of Cte-Nord-du-Golfe-Saint-Laurent.
      • 26 June: The Town of Pierrefonds became a City.
      • 10 July: Creation of the Town of Vaudreuil by the merger of the Municipality of Vaudreuil and the Village of Saint-Michel-de-Vaudreuil.
      • 13 July: The Town of Rimouski became a City.
      • 20 July: The Town of Rivire-des-Prairies is annexed by the City of Montral.
      • 10 August: The Parish of Trois-Rivires became the Town of Trois-Rivires-Ouest.
      • 21 September:
        • The Parish of Saint-Ambroise changed its name to Neufchtel.
        • The Parish of Saint-Philibert-de-Beauce became the Municipality of Saint-Philibert.
      • 19 October: The Parish of Saint-Luc became a Town.
      • 9 November: The Township of Farnham-Est became the Municipality of Adamsville.
      • 23 November: The Parish of Boucherville is annexed by the Town of Boucherville.
      • 21 December:
        • The Town of La Petite-Rivire changed its name to Duberger.
        • The Municipality of Drummondville-Sud became a Town.
      • 28 December:
        • The Village of Rivire-du-Moulin became a Town.
        • The Parish of Saint-Romuald-d'Etchemin became a Town.

      1964[edit]

      [1732]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Champneuf.
        • Creation of the Municipality of Namur from territories taken from the United Townships of Suffolk-et-Addington.
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Godard-de-Lejeune.
        • Creation of the Village of Nazareth from territories taken from the Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Sacr-Cur.
        • Creation of the Village of Pointe-aux-Outardes and the Village of Pointe-Lebel.
        • Creation of the Village of Sainte-Agathe-Sud from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Agathe.
      • 1 February: The Village of Sweetsburgh is annexed by the Town of Cowansville.
      • 21 March: The Parish of Saint-Charles-de-Caplan became the Municipality of Caplan.
      • 28 March:
        • The Municipality of Bout-de-lIsle is annexed by the Town of Sainte-Anne-de-Bellevue.
        • The Parish of Notre-Dame-de-Liesse is annexed by the City of Saint-Laurent.
      • 25 April: The Village of Saraguay is annexed by the City of Montral.
      • 9 May: The Parish of Sainte-Victoire changed its name to Sainte-Victoire-de-Sorel.
      • 18 June:
        • Creation of the Town of Bromont from territories taken from the Village of Shefford-Ouest, the Township of Brome and the Township of Shefford.
        • The Town of Laval-Ouest became a City.
      • 27 June: The Parish of Sainte-Philomne became a Town.
      • 11 July: The Parish of Neufchtel became a Town.
      • 18 July: The Town of Sainte-Rose became a City.
      • 8 August: The Township of Auckland became the Municipality of Saint-Malo.
      • 29 August: The Village of Princeville became a Town.
      • 14 November: The Municipality of Hull changed its name to Lucerne.
      • 5 December: The Municipality of Havre-Aubert-Est changed its name to Havre-Aubert.

      1965[edit]

      [1732]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Elzar from territories taken from the Municipality of Bonaventure, the Municipality of New Carlisle, the Municipality of Paspbiac-Ouest and other unorganized territories.
        • Creation of the Municipality of Saint-Jean-de-la-Lande.
        • Creation of the Village of le-dEntre from territories taken from the Municipality of Havre-Aubert.
        • The Village of Sainte-Adle is annexed by the Parish of Sainte-Adle.
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Alexandre-des-Lacs from territories taken from the Parish of Saint-Benot-Joseph-Labre, the Parish of Saint-Tharcisius and other unorganized territories.
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Nil and the Parish of Saint-Ren-de-Matane from territories taken from the dissolution of an unorganized territory formed from territories taken from the Parish of Sainte-Flicit, the former Township of Romieux and the former United Township of Dalibaire-et-Romieu.
        • Creation of the Parish of Trinit-des-Monts.
      • 20 February: The Town of Chteau dEau is annexed by the Town of Loretteville.
      • 13 March: The Parish of Chnville became the Municipality of Lac-Simon.
      • 10 April: The Parish of Sainte-Adle became a Municipality.
      • 22 May: The Parish of Saint-Grard-Magella became the Town of Blair.
      • 19 June: The Township of Ely changed its name to Valcourt.
      • 17 July: The Parish of Notre-Dame-des-Laurentides became a Town.
      • 6 August:
        • Creation of the Town of Laval by the merger of the City of Chomedey, the City of Duvernay, the City of Laval-des-Rapides, the City of Laval-Ouest, the City of Pont-Viau, the City of Sainte-Rose, the Town of Auteuil, the Town of Fabreville, the Town of Laval-sur-le-Lac, the Town of Saint-Franois, the Town of Saint-Vincent-de-Paul, the Town of Sainte-Dorothe, the Town of Ville-des-Iles-Laval and the Town of Vimont.
        • Creation of the Town of Lebel-sur-Quvillon.
      • 14 August: The Municipality of Saint-tienne-de-la-Malbaie is annexed by the Town of La Malbaie.
      • 18 September: Creation of the City of Chambly by the merger of the Town of Chambly and the Town of Fort-Chambly.
      • 17 October: Creation of the Town of Bcancour by the merger of the Village of Bcancourt, the Village of Gentilly, the Village of La Rochelle, the Village of Laval, the Village of Villers, the Parish of Bcancour, the Parish of Saint-Edouard-de-Gentilly, the Parish of Saint-Grgoire-le-Grand, the Parish of Sainte-Angle-de-Laval, the Parish of Sainte-Gertrude and the Parish of Trs-Prcieux-Sang-de-Notre-Seigneur.
      • 23 October: The Town of Loretteville became a City.
      • 30 October: The Village of Saint-Joseph became the Town of Saint-Joseph-de-Beauce.
      • 13 November:
        • The Village of Waterville became a Town.
        • The Parish of Saint-Jean-Chrysostome became a Town.
      • 4 December: The Village of Charny became a Town.
      • 18 December: Creation of the City of Saint-Romuald-dEtchemin by the merger of the Town of Saint-Romuald-dEtchemin and the Parish of Saint-Telesphore.
      • 24 December: The Village of Causapscal became a Town.
      • 31 December: The Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-Chambly became the Town of Carignan.

      1966[edit]

      [1732]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of Baie-Johan-Beetz, The Municipality of Longue-Pointe and the Municipality of Rivire-Saint-Jean.
        • Creation of the Municipality of Notre-Dame-de-Lorette from territories taken from the Municipality of Saint-Michel-de-Mistassini and other unorganized territories.
        • Creation of the Parish of Saint-Charles-Garnier.
      • 29 January: The Municipality of Hull changed its name to Touraine.
      • 12 March: Creation of the Town of Mont-Saint-Hilaire by the merger of the Town of Saint-Hilaire-sur-Richelieu and the Municipality of Mont-Saint-Hilaire.
      • 19 March: The Town of Beaconsfield became a City.
      • 2 April: Creation of the City of Montmagny by the merger of the Town of Montmagny and the Parish of Saint-Thomas.
      • 23 April: The Municipality of Saint-David-dEscourt changed its name to Sully.
      • 30 April: Creation of the City of Lachute by the merger of the Town of Lachute and the Village of Ayersville.
      • 7 May: The Parish of Saint-Jacques-des-Piles changed its name to Grandes-Piles.
      • 21 May: The Town of Qubec-Ouest changed its name to Ville-Vanier.
      • 11 June: The Town of Ville-Vanier changed its name to Vanier.
      • 9 July: The Village of Isletville became the Town of LIslet.
      • 20 August: The Village of Shefford-Ouest is annexed by the Town of Bromont.
      • 24 September: The Village of Masson became a Town.
      • 12 November:
        • The Municipality of Joliette-Sud is annexed by the City of Joliette.
        • The Village of Drummondville-Ouest is annexed by the City of Drummondville.
      • 19 November:
        • The Village of Lac-Etchemin became a Town.
        • The Village of Saint-Pascal became a Town.
      • 10 December: The Municipality of Saint-Jrme became the Parish of Bellefeuille.
      • 17 December: The Township of Portland changed its name to Notre-Dame-de-la-Salette.
      • 24 December: The Municipality of Sydenham-Sud changed its name to Saint-Majorique.

      1967[edit]

      [1732]

      • 1 January: Creation of the Municipality of Lamarche from territories taken from the Municipality of Labrecque and other unorganized territories.
      • 7 January: The Municipality of Beauport-Ouest is annexed by the City of Beauport.
      • 21 January: The Municipality of Les cureuils is annexed by the Town of Donnacona.
      • 1 February: The Village of Grande-Rivire is annexed by the Municipality of Grande-Rivire.
      • 22 April: The Parish of Saint-Armand-Est changed its name to Frelighsburg.
      • 27 May: The Parish of Saint-Zotique is annexed by the Village of Saint-Zotique.
      • 17 June: The Municipality of Saint-Agricole changed its name to Val-des-Lacs.
      • 30 June:
        • The Village of Clermont became a Town.
        • The Village of piphanie became the Town of Lpiphanie.
        • The Village of Saint-Antoine-des-Laurentides became the Town of Saint-Antoine.
      • 22 July: The Parish of Sainte-Ccile is annexed by the City of Salaberry-de-Valleyfield.
      • 29 July: The Village of Notre-Dame-de-Lorette became the Town of Ancienne-Lorette.
      • 16 September: The Village of Nazareth and the Parish of Notre-Dame-du-Sacr-Cur are annexed by the City of Rimouski.
      • 14 October:
        • The Municipality of Douville became a Town.
        • The Village of Saint-Gabriel-de-Brandon became the Town of Saint-Gabriel.
        • The Parish of Saint-Joseph-de-Mont-Rolland became the Municipality of Mont-Rolland.
        • The Township of Wexford became the Municipality of Entrelacs.
      • 21 October: The Village of Soulanges became the Town of Les Cdres.
      • 16 December:
        • The Parish of Saint-Germain-de-Rimouski is annexed by the City of Rimouski.
        • The Parish of Sainte-Julienne-de-Rawdon changed its name to Sainte-Julienne.
      • 23 December: The Parish of Sainte-Rose-du-Dgel changed its name to Sainte-Rose-du-Dgelis.

      1968[edit]

      [1732]

      • 1 January:
        • Creation of the Municipality of LAscension-de-Patapdia.
        • Creation of the Municipality of Sainte-Paule.
      • 3 February: The Town of Sainte-Philomne changed its name to Mercier.
